56b4(mdo 'grel): med pa/ snang ba med pa/ rnam par rig pa med pa/ rten med pa ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes so zhes ji ltar mdo las gsungs pa'i mtshan nyid de gsal bar bstan pa yin// snang ba'i phyir ni nam mkha'i dkyil ltar chos thams cad mthong
56b5(mdo 'grel): ba'i phyir dang / sgyu ma la sogs pa ltar 'du byed thams cad mthong ba'i phyir ro// phan yon rtogs pa ni rnam pa bzhi ste/ chos kyi sku rdzogs par rab tu thob pa'i phyir dang / gong na med pa'i bde ba'i gnas pa rab tu thob pa'i phyir dang / mthong ba'i
56b6(mdo 'grel): piphyir dang / mthong ba'i 'byor pa rab tu thob pa'i phyir dang / ston pa'i 'byor pa rab tu thob pa'i phyir ro// yongasu shes pa las rtogs pa yang rnam pa bzhi ste/ gnyen po yong su shes pa'i phyir dang / mtshan nyid yongasasu shes pa'i phyir dang / khyad par
57a1(mdo 'grel): yongasu shes pa'i phyir dang / las yongasu shes pa'i phyir ro// de la gnyen po yongasu shes pa ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes te/ chos dang / gang zag dang / gyur pa dang / tha dad pa dang / skur pa lnga ni bden pa'i ngo bo las zhen pa'i gnyen po'o// mtshan
57a2(mdo 'grel): nyid yong su shes pa ni/ yid la byed pa med pa dang / yang dag par 'das pa dang / nye bar zhi pa dang / ngo bo'i don dang / bkra bar 'dzin pa lnga spangs pa ni rang gi mtshan nyid do// khyad par yongasasu shes pa ni rtog pa med pa dang / phyogs gcig pa ma yin pa nyid dang /
57a3(mdo 'grel): sa pa med pa nyid dang / gtan du ba nyid dang / gong na med pa rnam pa lnga'i khyad par gyi phyir ro// las yong su shes pa ni/ rnam par rtog par ming du byed pa dang / bla na med pa'i bde ba sbyin pa dang / nyon mongs pa dang / shes bya'i sgrib pa dang bral bar sbyor ba dang /
57a4(mdo 'grel): de'i rjes las thob pa'i ye shes kyis shes bya'i rnam pa thams cad lo 'jug pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dag pa dang / sems can yongasasu smin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid stong par byed pa'i rnam pa lnga ni las kyi khyad par ro// yid
57a5(mdo 'grel): la byed pa rtogs pa ni/ ji skad du/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes de rtogs par 'dod pa de 'di ltar yid la byed pa/ de bzhin nyid mi shes pa thog ma med pa'i dus can las te/ yang dag pa ma yin pa'i kun tu rtog pas sa thon
57a6(mdo 'grel): thathams cad pa ste/ me bden pa gnyisu snang ba'i rgyu dang / de la brten pa tha dad pa yang yin te de la rgyu dang 'bras bur bcas pa snang du zin kyang mi bden pa yin// de ltar snang bas kyang de'i chos nyid ni sdang ba med la/ dasdang ba med las kyang chos nyid sdang ba na
57b1(mdo 'grel): zhes tshul bzhin yid la byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes rtogs pa yin no// de ltar nye bar dmigs pa las rnam par rig pa tsam la nye bar dmigs pa rtogs par byed// rnam par rig pa tsam la nye bar dmigs pa las don thams cad
57b2(mdo 'grel): dmigs pa med par byed do// don thams cad dmigs pa med pa las rnam par rigs pa tsam yang mi dmigs par rtogs par byed do// de mi dmigs pa las gnyi ga khyad par dmigs pa rtogs par byed pa yin// der gang yang gnyis dmigs pa med pa de ni
57b3(mdo 'grel): rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes te/ yul med cing dmigs pa med pa yin te/ mtshan ma thams cad mi dmigs pas nye bar mtshon po nyid kyi phyir// sbyor ba rtogs pa ni rnam pa bzhi ste/ mos pas spyod pa'i sa la mos pas sbyor ba'i phyir dang / nga 'di nges par
57b4(mdo 'grel): 'byed pa'i gnas skabs so// de nyid sa dang po la so sor rig par sbyor ba'i phyir dang / de nyid ni reg pa'i gnas skabs so// rnam par ma dag pa'i sa drug la sgom pa la rab tu sbyor ba'i phyir dang / yong su dag pa gsum po la yang ngo // de nyid ni rje su
57b5(mdo 'grel): dran pa'i gnas skabs so// sangs rgyas kyi sa la mthar phyin pa la sbyor ba'i phyir te/ lhun gyis grub par sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa rgyun mi 'chad pa'i phyir ro// de nyid ni de'i bdag nyid ni tre su dran pa'i gnas skabs so// nyes dmigs rtogs pa ni// gnas
57b6(mdo 'grel): skabasu gyur pa med na'o// nyes dmigs rnam pa bzhi ste/ nyon mongs pa mi 'jug po'i rten med pa'i nyes dmigs dang / lam 'jug pa'i rten med pa'i nyes dmigs dang / gang zag mya ngan las 'das par tha snyad bzhag pa'i rten med pa'i nyes dmigs
58a1(mdo 'grel): dang / byang chub rnam pa gsum gyi khyad par gyi sgra skad bzhag pa'i rten med pa'i nyes dmigs// de dag las bzlog pa la brten nas gnas yongs sgyur pa yod pa la/ phan yon rnam pa bzhi nyid du rig par bya'o// dang /
58a2(mdo 'grel): nyid ni gnas gyur pa ji lta bar rtogs pa rnam pa bcu rig par bya'o// med pa'i chos snang ba ni// dper ni sgyu ma dang rmi lam la sogs pa bzhin no// gnas gyur pa'i dpe ni/ na mkha' dang gser dang chu la sogs pa bzhin no//
58a3(mdo 'grel): chos dang chos nyid rnam par 'byed pa 'phags pa byams pas mdzad pa rdzogs so// / d+huk+Sha k+Shi mkhan po baiN+DitashAn ti b+hU drA dang / bu chen gyi lo tsAb dge slong tshul khrims rgyal
58a4(mdo 'grel): bskyar cing zhus te gtan la phab po las/ srad kyi kha che'i mkhan po paN+Di ta pa ra he ta dang / bu chen rgya lo tsA ba dge slong dga' rdor gyis thugs dam sa tho ling gi gtsug lag khang du btsos shing gtan la phab pa/
59a1(mdo 'grel): chos dang chos nyid rnam 'byed cig bcad pa bzhug//
59b1(mdo 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ d+harma d+harma tA bi b+he ga kA ri ka/ bod skad du/ chos dang chos nyid rnam par 'byed ba'i tshig le'ur byas pa/ mgon po byams pa la phyag 'tsha lo// shes nas 'ga' zhig yongasu spang bya zhing // gzhan 'ga' zhig
59b2(mdo 'grel): ni mngon sum nyid du bya// des na de drag mtshan nyid rnam dbye ba// byed par 'dod pas bstan bcos 'dri brtsom mo// 'di dag thams cad mdor bsdu na// rnam pa gnyis shes bya ste// chos dang de bzhin chos nyid kyis// thams cad bsdus pa nyid phyir ro// /
59b3(mdo 'grel): de la chos kyis phye ba ni// 'khor ba yin te chos nyid kyis// rab tu phye ba theg gsum gyi// mya ngan las ni 'das pa'o// de las chos kyis mtshan nyid ni// gnyis dang ji ltar mngon brjod par// snang ba yang dag ma yin pa'i// kun rtog pa ste med snang phyir
59b4(mdo 'grel): des na yang dag ma yin pa'o// de yang thams cad don med cing // rtog tsam yin pas kun rtog pa'o// gzhan yang chos nyid mtshan nyid ni// gzung ba dang ni 'dzin pa dang // brjod par bya dang rjod par byed// khyad med de bzhin nyid yin no// med
59b5(mdo 'grel): bsnung phyir 'khrul pa ni// kun nus nyon mongs na yon te// sgyu ma'i klung chen spro snang ban no// yod pa yang ni mi snang phyir// ming snad dag las gang rlung zhig/ med na laN+Dal deng ma'o/ m+bu dang // de bzhin smon nas rkyen song sna dang // rnam par bya
59b6(mdo 'grel): ba mi 'thod do// gnyis po dag ni gcig nyid dang // so so ba yang ma yin te// yod pa dang ni med pa dag/ khyad par yod dang med phyir ro// rnam pa drug gis chos rnams la// 'jug pa bla ni med pa ste// mtshan nyid dang ni grub pa ste// gcig dang tha dod
60a1(mdo 'grel): ma yin zhing // gnas ni thun mong thun mong min// gzung 'ang 'dzin par snang ba ni// med la rab tu 'jug paso// de la mtshan nyid grub pa dang // gcig dang tha dad ma yin pa// ji ltar mdor bstan bzhin du'o// gang zhig gang du 'khor ba na// de ni kun du gan+d+ha pa ste/
60a2(mdo 'grel): son khams dang snod kyi khams// snod kyi khams ni thun mongs ltar// rnam par rig pa thun mong yin// sems can khams ni thun mong dang // yang na thun mong ma yin pa'o// de la skye dang tha snyad dang // rjesu bzung dang tshar bcad dang // phan pa dang ni gnod pa dang // yon tan skyon ni
60a3(mdo 'grel): phan tshun du// bdag po nyid kyis phan tshun du// yin pa'i phyir na thun mong ba'o// gnas dang rnam par rig pa dang // bde sdug las dang 'chi 'pho dang // skye ba dang ni bcings pa dang // grol ba thun mong ma yin phyir// de nas thun mong ma yin pa'o// phyi rol bzung po thun mong
60a4(mdo 'grel): bar// snang ba 'dzin pa'i rnam rig pa'o// rnam par shes las phyi rol tu// gyur pa'i don yod ma yin te// thun mong ba nyid yin phyir ro// cig shos thun mong ma yin pa'i// gzung ba rnam par rig pa'i don// gzhan gyi sems la soT pa ni// mnye bar ma bzhag ma nyaM gzhag pa'i// 'dzin
60a5(mdo 'grel): pa'i rnam par rig pa la// phan tshun yul gyur ma yin te// mnyam pa ma bzhag pa la ni// rang gi rnam rtog snang phyir dang // mnyam par bzhag pa dag la ni// tingange 'dzin gyi spyod yul de'i// gzugs brnyan rab tu snang phyir ro// gzung bar snang ba med grub na// 'dzin /
60a6(mdo 'grel): par snang ba med grub bo// de las kyang ni bzung ba dang // 'dzin par snang ba med pa la// 'jug pa grub ste thog med pa'i// kun nas ldang ba grub pa so// gnyisu yongasu ma grub par// rab tu grub par yin phyir ro// rnam pa drug gis chos nyid la// 'jug pa bla na med
60b1(mdo 'grel): pa ste// mtshan nyid kun du gnas pa dang // nges par 'byed dang reg pa dang // rje su dran dang de dag nyid// nye bar son la 'jug paso// mtshan nyid mdo ni ji lta bzhin// gnas ni chos rnams thams cad de// 'on kyang mdo sde thams cad kyang // de la nges par
60b2(mdo 'grel): 'byed pa ni/ theg pa chen po'i mdo sde la// brten pa'i tshul bzhin yid byed pas// bsdus pa'i sbyor lam thams cad do// reg pa yang dag lha thob phyir// mthong ba'i lam gyi mngon gsum gyi// tshul du de bzhin nyid thob cing // nyamasu myong ba gang
60b3(mdo 'grel): yin pa'o// rjesu dran pa reg pas ni// mthong ba'i don la sgom lam gyi// byang chub phyogs kyis bsdus pa ste// de yi dri ma sel ba'i phyir// de la de yi bdag nyid du// nye bar son pa'i de bzhin nyid// dri ma med par gyur pa na// thams cad de bzhin nyid tsam
60b4(mdo 'grel): du// snang ba de yang gnas gyur pa// grub pa yin rnam pa bcus// gnas yod gyur la 'jug pa ni// bla na med pa nyid yin te// ngo bo rdzas dang gang zag dang // khyad par dgos pa gnas dang ni// yid la byed dang sbyor ba dang // nyes dmigs phan yon
60b5(mdo 'grel): 'jug paso// de la ngo bo 'jug pa ni// glo bur pa yi dri ma dang // de bzhin nyid ni snang ba dang // snang ba'i don te de bzhin nyid// dri ma med pa gang yin pa'o// dngos po rdzas la 'jug pa ni// thun mong snod kyi rnam rig pa// de bzhin nyid du gyur pa dang // ma
60b6(mdo 'grel): sde chos kyi dbyings nyid kyi// de bzhin nyid du gyur pa dang // thun mong min pa sems can gyi// khams kyi rnam par rig pa yi// de bzhin nyid du gyur pa'o// gang zag dag la 'jug pa ni// dang po gnyis ni sangs rgyas dang // byang chub sems dpa
61a1(mdo 'grel): rnams kyin// de bzhin nyid yongs sgyur pa ste// phyi mnyan thos rnams dang ni// rang sangs rgyas kyi yang yin no// khyad par can la 'jug pa ni// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' rnams// zhing yongs su dag pa'i khyad par
61a2(mdo 'grel): bar dang // chos sku longs spyod rdzogs pa dang // sprul sku thob pas gzigs pa dang // 'doms pa dang ni dbang 'byor nyid// thob pa'i khyad par las yino// dgos pa rtogs la 'jug pa ni// sngon gyi smon lam khyad pa dang // theg pa chen
61a3(mdo 'grel): bos ston pa yis// dmigs pa'i khyad par sa bcu la// rab tu sbyor ba'i khyad par ro// gnas sam rten la 'jug pa ni// rnam par mi rtog ye shes la// 'jug pa rnam pa drug gis te// dmigs dang mtshan mo spangs pa dang // yang
61a4(mdo 'grel): dag pa yi sbyor ba dang // mtshan nyid dang ni phan yon dang // yongasu shes la 'jug pas so// de la dang po dmigs pa la// 'jug pa rnam bzhir shes bya ste// theg pa chen po ston pa dang // de la mos dang nges pa dang // tshogs ni
61a5(mdo 'grel): yongasu rdzogs paso// gnyis pa mtshan ma spangs pa la// 'jug pa yang ni rnam bzhi ste// mi mthun pa dang gnyen po dang // de bzhin nyid dang rtogs pa dang // mtshan ma drag ni spangs pa so// 'dir ni rim pa ji lta bzhin// rags dang
61a6(mdo 'grel): 'bring dang phra mo dang // ring du rjesu 'brel pa yi// mtshan ma yongasu spangs pa yin// yang dge pa mi sbyor ba la// 'jug pa yang ni rnam bzhi ste// dmigs pa ya ni sbyor ba dang // mi dmigs pa yi sbyor ba dang // dmigs pa
61b1(mdo 'grel): mi dmigs sbyor ba dang // mi dmigs dmyigs pa'i sbyor ba'o// de la mtshan nyid 'jug pa ni// rnam pa gsum gyis shes bya ste// chos nyid gnas pa nyid las ni// gnyis sa med cing brjod med pa'o// chos nyid rab tu gnas phyir ro// snang
61b2(mdo 'grel): ba med las gnyis dang ni// ji ltar mngon par brjod pa dang // dbang po yul rnam rig pa dang // snod kyi 'jig rten snod med phyir// des na 'dris ni brtag med pa// bstan du med pa gnas med pa// sdang ba med cing rnam rig med// /
61b3(mdo 'grel): gnas pa med pa zhes bya ste// rnam par mi rtog ye shes kyi// mtshan nyid mdo bzhin brjod pa yin// snang ba las ni chos thams cad// na mkha'i dkyil mnyam snang phyir ro// 'du byed thams cad sgyu ma sogs// lta bur snang ba yin
61b4(mdo 'grel): phyir ro// phan yon 'jug pa rnam bzhi ste// chos sku rdzogs par thob pa dang // gong na med pa'i bde thob dang // gzigs pa dbang sbyor thob pa dang // ston la dbang 'byor thob pa dang // yongasu shes la 'jug pa ni// rnam pa bzhi ru shes
61b5(mdo 'grel): bya ste/ gnyen po yongasu shes pa dang // mtshan nyid yongs su shes pa dang // khyad par yongs su shes pa dang // las lnga yongs su shes pa'o// de la gnyen po shes pa ni// rnam par mi rtog ye shes de// chos dang /
61b6(mdo 'grel): gang zag 'dzin pa dang // yongs su 'gyur ba tha dad dang // skur pa 'debs pa nyid yin to// med pa 'dzin pa rnam lnga'i// gnyen po bstan pa yin phyir ro// mtshan nyid yongs su shes pa ni// yid la mi byed yang dag 'das// nye
62a1(mdo 'grel): bar zhi dang ngo bo'i don// mngon brtags 'dzin pa rnam pa lta// spangs pa'i rang gi mtshan nyid do// khyad par yongs su shes pa ni// rnam par mi rtog pa nyid dang // nyi tshe ba ni ma yin dang // gnas med
62a2(mdo 'grel): pa dang gtan du dang // gong na med pa'i rnam pa ste// khyad par rnam pa lnga yin no// tha ma las yongs shes pa ni// rnam rtogau ring du byed pa dang // bla na med pa'i bde stong dang // nyon mongs pa dang shes bya yi// sgrib pa
62a3(mdo 'grel): bar byed pa dang // de yi rjes las thob pa yi// ye shes shes bya'i rnam pa ni// thams cad la ni 'jug pa dang // sangs rgyas zhing ni sbyong pa dang // sems can yongs su smin byed dang // rnam po thams cang mkhyen
62a4(mdo 'grel): pa nyid// gtod cing ster bar byed pa ste// rnam lnga las kyi khyad par ro// yid la byed la 'jug pa ni// rnam par mi rtog ye shes la// 'jug pa 'dod pa'i gang zag ni// byang chub semos dpa' gang yin pa// 'di ltar yong
62a5(mdo 'grel): la byed pa ste// de bzhin nyid ni mi shes pas// mi bden par ni yongs brtog pa'i// sa bon thams cad pa zhes pa// med pa gnyis su snang ba'i rgyu// de la rten pa'i tha dad rgyu// des nA rgyu dang 'bras bur bcas// snang du zin
62a6(mdo 'grel): kyang med pa'o// de snang chos nyid mi snang zhing // de mi snang bas chos nyid snang // de ltar tshul bzhin yid byed na// byang chub sems dpa' mi rtog pa'i// ye shes la ni 'jug pa'o// de ltar dmigs pa rnam rig tsam// dmigs dang /
62b1(mdo 'grel): rnam par rig tsam du// dmigs las don rnams mi dmigs dang // don rnams mi dmigs pa las ni// rnam par rig tsam mi dmigs dang / mi dmigs lngas gnyis po ni// khyad med pa yi dmigs la 'jug/ de
62b2(mdo 'grel): gnyis khyad par mi dmigs rnams// de ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i// ye shes yul med dmigs med pa// mtshan ma thams cad mi dmigs pas/ pa phye ba di yin phyir ro// sbyor bso sa la 'jug pa ni// rnam pa bzhin
62b3(mdo 'grel): shes bya ste// mos pa'i rab tu sbyor bas ni// mos pas spyod pa'i sa la ste// nges pas 'byed pa'i gnas skabs so// so sor rab tu rtog pa sbyar bas ni dang po ste// de nyid reg pa'i gnas skabaso// bsgom pa
62b4(mdo 'grel): rab tu sbyor bas ni// ma dag pa yos sa drug dang // dag pa'i sa ni gsum po ste// de ni rjes dran gnas skabs so// mthar phyin pa la sbyor bas na// snyun gyis grub par sangs rgyas kyis// mdzad pa rgyun mi 'chang phyir ro// de
62b5(mdo 'grel): ni de yi bdag nyid du// nye bar 'gro ba'i gnas skabs so// nyes dmigs dag la 'jug pa ni// gnas yongs gyur pa med pa yi// nyes dmigs bzhi ste nyon mongs pa// mi 'jug rten med nyes pa dang // lam 'jug rten med
62b6(mdo 'grel): nyes pa dang // mya ngan 'das pa'i gang zag rnams// gdags pa'i gzhi med nyes pa dang // byang chub gsum gyi khyad par dag/ gdags pa'i gzhi med nyes pa'o// bzlog nas pan yor 'jug pa ni// rnam pa bzhi ru shes
63a1(mdo 'grel): med pa'i chos rnams snang ba'i dpe// sna ma rmi lam la sogs bzhin// gnas yongs gyur pa dper bya na// na mkha' gser dang chu sogs bzhin//
63a2(mdo 'grel): chos dang chos nyid rnam par 'byed pa'i tshig le'ur byas pa/ mgon po byams pas mdzad pa rdzogs so// / baN+Di ta chen po ma hA dza na dang / lo tsA ba dge bsnyen seng ge rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur ba'o//
64a1(mdo 'grel): theg pa chen po rgyud bla ma'i bstan bcos bzhunas/
64b1(mdo 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ ma hA yA not+ta ra tan+t+ra shAs+t+ra/ bod skad du/ theg pa chen po rgyud bla ma'i bstan bcos/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas chos tshogs khams
64b2(mdo 'grel): dang byang chub dang // yon mgon sangs rgyas phrin las tha ma ste// bstan bcos kun gyi lus ni mdor bsdu na// rdo rje yi ni gnas bdun 'di dag go// 'di dag rang mtshan nyid kyis rjes 'brel bar// go rim ji bzhin gzungs kyi rgyal
64b3(mdo 'grel): bo'i mdor// gleng gzhi las ni gnas gsum rig bya ste// bzhi ni blo ldan rgyal chos dbye ba las// sangs rgyas las chos chos las 'phags pa'i tshogs// tshogs las snying po ye shes khams 'thob mthar// ye shes de 'thob
64b4(mdo 'grel): byang chub mchog stobs sogs// sems can kun don byed chos rnams dang ldan// gang zhig thog ma dbus mtha' med zhi sangs rgyas nyid rang rnam sangs rgyas// sangs rgyas nas ni ma rtogs rtogs phyir 'jig med rtag pa'i lam
64b5(mdo 'grel): ston pa// mkhyen brtse'i ral gri rdo rje mchog bsnams sdug bsngal myu gu gcod mjed cig/ sna tshogs lha thibs kyis bskor the rtsom rtsig pa 'jig mdzad de lnga 'dud// 'dus ma byas shing lhun gyis grub// gzhan gyis rten gyis rtog
64b6(mdo 'grel): min la// mkhyen dang btse dang nus par ldan// don gnyis ldan pa'i sangs rgyas nyid// thog ma dbus mtha' med pa yi// rang bzhin yin phyir 'dus ma byas// zhi ba chos kyi sku can phyir// lhun gyis grub ces bya bar brjod// so so
65a1(mdo 'grel): rang gi rtogs bya'i phyir// gzhan gyi rkyen gyis rtogs min pa// de ltar rnam gsum rtogs phyir mkhyen// lam ston phyir na thugs brtse ba// nus pa ye shes thugs rje yis// sdug bsngal nyon mongs spong phyir ro// dang po gsum gyis
65a2(mdo 'grel): rang do/ phyi ma gsum gyis gzhan don yin// gang zhig med min yod min yod med ma yin yod med las gzhan du'ang // brtag par mi nus nges tshig dang bral so so rang gis reg zhi ba// dri med ye shes 'od zer snang ldan dmigs pa kun la
65a3(mdo 'grel): chags pa dang // sdang dang rab rib rnam par 'joms mdzad dam chos nyi ma de la 'dud// bsam med gnyis med rtog med pa// dag gsal gnyen po'i phyogs nyid kyis// gang zhig gang gi na Da bral ba// bden gnyis mtshan nyid can de chos// chags bral
65a4(mdo 'grel): nyid ni 'gog pa dang // lam gyi bden pa dag gis bsdus// go rim ji bzhin de dag kyang // yon tan gsum gsum gyis rig bya// brtag min phyir dang brjod min phyir// 'phags phra mkhyen phyir bsam med nyid// zhi nyid gnyis med rtog med de// dag
65a5(mdo 'grel): sogs gsum ni nyi bzhin no// sems de rang bzhin 'od gsal bas na nyon mongs ngo bo med gzigs pas// gang dag 'gro kun bdag med mtha' zhi yang dag rtogs nas thams cad la// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rjes zhugs gzigs pa
65a6(mdo 'grel): sgrib pa med pa'i blo mnga' ba// sems can rnam dag mtha' yas yul can ye shes gzigs mnga' de la 'dud // ji bzhi ni ji snyed nang gi ni// ye shes gzigs pa dag pa'i phyir// blo ldan phyir mi ldog pa'i tshogs// bla med yon tan dang
65b1(mdo 'grel): ldan nyid// 'gro ba zhi ba'i chos nyid du// rtogs phyir ji lta nyid de yang // rang bzhin gyis ni yongs dag phyir// nyon mongs gdod nas zad phyir ro// shes bya mthar thug rtogs pa'i blos// thams cad mkhyen pa'i chos nyid ni// sems can thams
65b2(mdo 'grel): cad la yod pa// mthong phyir ji snyed yod pa nyid// de ltar rtogs pa gang yin de// so so rang shes mthong ba nyid// dri med dbyings la chags mod dang // thogs med phyir de dag pa yin// ye shes gzigs pa dag pas na// sangs rgyas ye shes
65b3(mdo 'grel): bla med phyir// 'phags pa phyir mi ldog pa ni// lus can kun gyi skyabs yin no// ston pa bstan pa slob don gyi// thog pa gsum dang byed gsum la// mos pa rnams kyi dbang byas nas// skyabs gsum rnam par bzhag pa yin// spang phyir slu ba'i
65b4(mdo 'grel): chos can phyir// med phyir 'jigs dang bcas pa'i phyir// chos rnams gnyis dang 'phags pa'i tshogs// gtan gyi skyabs mchog ma yin no// dam pa'i don du 'gro ba yi// skyabs ni sangs rgyas nyag cig yin// thub pa chos kyi sku can
65b5(mdo 'grel): phyir// tshogs kyang de yi mthar thug phyir// 'byung ba dkon phyir dri med phyir// mthu ldan phyir dang 'jig rten gyi// rgyan gyur phyir dang mchog nyid phyir// 'gyur ba med phyir dkon mchog nyid// dri bcas de bzhin nyid dang dri ma med// dri med sangs
65b6(mdo 'grel): rgyas yon tan rgyal ba'i mdzod// gang las dkon mchog dge ba gsum 'byung ba// don dam gzigs pa rnams kyi yul nyid do// dkon mchog gsum po 'di yi rigs// thams cad gzigs pa rnams kyi yul// de yang rnam bzhi go rim
66a1(mdo 'grel): bzhin// rgyu bzhi yis ni bsam mi khyab// dag dang nyon mongs dang ldan phyir// kun nas nyon mongs med dag phyir// rnam par dbye ba med ches phyir// lhun grub rnam par mi rtog phyir// rtogs bya rtogs pa de yi ni// yan lag
66a2(mdo 'grel): rtogs par byed phyir te// go rim ji bzhin gnas gci ga ste// dag rgyu gsum ni rkyen yin no// rdzogs sangs sku ni 'phro phyir dang // de bzhin nyid dpyor med phyir dang // rigs yod phyir na lus can kun// rtag tu sangs rgyas snying po can// ngo bo rgyu
66a3(mdo 'grel): 'bras las ldan 'jug pa dang // gnas skabs de bzhin kun tu 'gro ba'i don// rtag tu mi 'gyur yon tan dbyer med no// don dam dbyings kyi dgongs don yin shes bya// rin chen na mkha' chu dag bzhin// rtag tu rang bzhin nyon mongs med// tshwa/
66a4(mdo 'grel): mos lhag pa'i shes rab dang // ting 'dzin snying rje las byung ba// mthu dang gzhan du mi 'gyur dang // brlan pa'i ngo bo rang bzhin phyir// 'di dag nor bu rin chen mkha'// chu yi yon tan chos mthun nyid// chos la khong khro bdag lta dang //
66a5(mdo 'grel): 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gyis 'jigs dang // sems can don la ltos med nyid// 'dod chen mu stegs nyan thos dang // rang 'byung rnams kyi sgrib rnam bzhi// dag rgyu lhag par smos pa las// sogs pa'i chos ni rnam bzhi nyid// theg mchog
66a6(mdo 'grel): la mos sa bon shes rab ni// sangs rgyas chos bskyed ma dang bsam gtan gyi// bde ba mngal gnas snying rje'i ma ma can// gang yin de dag thub pa'i rjes skyes sras// gtsang bdag bde dang rtag nyid kyi// yon tan pha rol tu phyin 'bras//
66b1(mdo 'grel): sdug bsngal yid 'byung zhi thob par// 'dun dang smon pa'i las can no// 'di dag 'bras ni mdor bsdu na// chos kyi sku la phyin ci log/ rnam pa bzhi las bzlog pa yi// gnyen pos rab tu phye ba nyid// de ni rang bzhin dag phyir dang // bag chags
66b2(mdo 'grel): spospangs phyir gtsang ba yin// bag dang bdag med spros pa dag/ nye bar zhi bas dam pa'i bdag/ yid kyi rang bzhin phung po dang // de rgyu log phyir bde ba nyid// 'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das// mnyam pa nyid du rtogs phyir rtag/ bdag sred ma
66b3(mdo 'grel): lus shes rab kyis bcad de// sems can sred phyir brtse ldan zhi thob min// de ltar blo brtse byang chub thabs bsten nas// 'phags pa 'khor po 'am mya ngan 'da' mi 'gyur// gal te sangs rgyas khams med na// sdug la skyo bar mi 'gyur zhing //
66b4(mdo 'grel): mya ngan 'das la 'dod pa dang // don gnyer srin po'ang med par 'gyur// srid dang mya ngan 'das la de'i// sdug bde'i skyon yon mthong ba 'di// rigs yod las yin gang phyir de// rigs med dag la med phyir ro// rgya mtsho tshe bzhin dpag med pa/
66b5(mdo 'grel): yon tan rin chen mi zad gnas// dbyar med yon tan dang ldan pa'i// ngo bo nyid phyir mar me bzhin// chos sku rgyal ba'i ye shes dang // thugs rje'i khams ni bsdus pa'i phyir// snod dang rin chen chu yis 'di// rgya mtsho dang ni mtshungs par bstan//
66b6(mdo 'grel): dri med gnas la mngon shes dang // ye shes dri med de nyid dang // rnam dbye modo phyir mar me yi// snang dang dro mdog chos mtshungs can// so so'i skye 'phags rdzogs sangs kyi// de bzhin nyid dbye'i 'jug pa las// de la gzigs pas
67a1(mdo 'grel): sems can la// rgyal ba'i snying po 'di bstan to// so so'i skye bo phyin ci log/ bden pa mthong ba bzlog pa ste// de bzhin gshegs pa ji lta bzhin// phyin ci ma log spros med nyid// ma dag ma dag dag pa dang // shin tu rnam
67a2(mdo 'grel): dag go rim bzhin// sems can byang chub sems dpa' dang // de bzhin gshegs pa zhes brjod do// ngo bo nyid la sogs pa'i don// 'di drug gis ni bsdus pa yi// khams ni gnas skabs gsum dag tu// ming gsum gyis ni bstan pa nyid//
67a3(mdo 'grel): ji ltar rtog med bdag nyid can// nam mkha' kun tu rjes song ltar// sems kyi rang bzhin dri med dbyings// de bzhin kun du 'gro ba nyid// de spyi'i mtshan nyid nyes pa dang // yon tan mthar thug khyab pa ste// gzugs kyi rnam pa dman pa dang /
67a4(mdo 'grel): bar ma mchog la na mkha' bzhin// nyes pa glo bur dang ldan dang // yon tan rang bzhin nyid ldan phyir// ji ltar sngar bzhin phyis de bzhin// 'gyur ba med pa'i chos nyid do// ji ltar na mkha' kun song ba// phra zhing nye bar gos pa med// de bzhin
67a5(mdo 'grel): sems can thams cad la// gnas 'di nye bar gos pa med// ji ltar 'jig rten thams cad du// nam mkha' las ni skye zhing 'jig// de bzhin 'dus ma byas dbyings la// dbang po rnams ni skye zhing 'jig/ ji ltar na mkha' me rnams kyis// sngon chad
67a6(mdo 'grel): nam yang tshig pa med// de bzhin 'di ni 'chi ba dang // na dang rga ba'i mes ma tshig/ sa ni chul chu rlung la// rlung ni mkha' la rab tu gnas// mkha' ni rlung dang chu dag dang // sa yi khams la gnas ma yin// de bzhin phung po khams dbang rnams//
67b1(mdo 'grel): las dang nyon mongs dag la gnas// las dang nyon mongs tshul bzhin min// yid la byed la rtag tu gnas// tshul bzhin ma yin yid byed ni// sems kyi dag pa la rab gnasas/ sems kyi rang bzhin chos rnams ni// thams cad la yang gnas pa
67b2(mdo 'grel): med/ sa dang 'dra bar phung po dang // skye mched khams rnams shes par bya// chu khams dang 'dra lus can gyis// las dang nyon mongs shes bya ste// tshul bzhin ma yin yid byed ni// rlung gi khams dang 'dra bar blta// rang ba'idi na mkha'i kham
67b3(mdo 'grel): bzhin du// de bzhin can min gnas pa med// tshul bzhin ma yin yod byed ni// sems kyi rang bzhin la gnas te// tshul bzhin ma yin yid byed kyis// las dang nyon mongs rab tu phye// las dang nyon mongs chu las ni// phung po skye mchen
67b4(mdo 'grel): khams rnams 'byung // de 'jig pa dang chags pa dang // skye dang 'jig par 'gyur ba yin// sems kyi rang bzhin na mkha' yi// mas ltar rgyu med rkyen med de// tshogs pa med cing skye ba dang // 'jig pa gnas pa'ang yod ma yin// sems
67b5(mdo 'grel): kyi rang bzhin 'od gsal gang yin pa// de ni nam mkha' bzhin du 'gyur med de// yang dag min rtog las byung 'dod chags sogs// glo bur dri mas de nyon mongs mi 'gyur// las dang nyon mongs chu tshogs kyis// 'di ni mngon par 'grub min te//
67b6(mdo 'grel): 'chi dang na dang rga ba'i me// mi bzad pas kyang tshig mi 'gyur// dus mtha' dmyal ba tha mal pa'i// me gsum 'chi dang na ba dang // rga ba'i me gsum rim bzhin du// de dang 'dra bar shes par bya// skye 'chi na dang rga ba las grol ba// 'di yi rang
68a1(mdo 'grel): bzhin ji bzhin nyid rtogs te// skye sogs 'phongs dang bral yang de yis rgyus// blo ldan 'gro la snying rje bskyed phyir bsten// 'phags pas 'chi dang na ba dang // rga ba'i sdug bsngal rtsa nas spangs// las dang nyon
68a2(mdo 'grel): mongs dbang gis skye// de la de med phyir de med// ji bzhin yang dag mthong ba'i phyir// skye sogs rnams las 'das gyur kyang // snying rje'i bdag nyid skye ba dang // 'chi dang rga dang na bar ston// rgyal sras 'gyur med chos nyid 'di//
68a3(mdo 'grel): rtogs nas ma rig ljongs rnams kyi// skye ba la sogs dag tu ni// mthong ba gang yin te smad // 'phags pa'i spyod yul thob pa gang // byis pa'i spyod yul du ston te// de nyid phyir ni 'gro ba yi// gnyen gyis thabs dang
68a4(mdo 'grel): snying rje'i mchog/ de ni 'jig rten thams ca de las// 'das kyang 'jig rten las ma g.yos// 'jig rten don du 'jig rten na// 'jig rten dri mas ma gos spyod// ji ltar pad+ma chu nang du// skyes pa chu yis gos pa med// de bzhin
68a5(mdo 'grel): 'di ni 'jig rten du// skyes kyang 'jig rten chos mi gos// bya ba sgrub la rtag tu blo// me bzhin du ni 'bar ba dang // zhi ba'i bsam gtan snyoms 'jug la// rtag tu snyoms par 'jug pa yin// sngon gyi 'phen pa'i dbang dang ni// rnam
68a6(mdo 'grel): rtog thams cad bral ba'i phyir// de ni lus can smin pa yi// don du 'bad pa byed ma yin// bsten dang gzugs sku dag dang ni// spyod dang spyod lam gyis kyang rung // gang zhig ji ltar gang gis 'dul// des de de ltar nyid du shes// de ltar
68b1(mdo 'grel): na mkha'i mtha' klas kyis// 'gro ba rtag tu lhun grub par// thogs med blo ldan de yi ni// sems can don ni yang dag 'jug/ byang chub sems drapa'i tshul 'di ni// rjes thob de bzhin gshegs rnams dang // sems can yang dag sgrol ba la// 'jig
68b2(mdo 'grel): rten na ni mnyam pa nyid// de lta mos kyi sa rdul dang // rgya mtsho ba lang rmig rjes kyo// khyad par gang yin sangs rgyas dang // byang chub sems dpa'i khyad de nyid// gzhan 'gyur min bdag mi zad chos ldan phyir// 'gro skyabs phyi ma'i mtha' med
68b3(mdo 'grel): mur thug phyir// de ni rtag tu gnyis med mi rtog phyir// 'jig med chos kyang ma byas rang bzhin phyir// skye ba med cing 'chi ba med// gnod med rga ba med pa ste// don rtag dang brtan phyir dang // zhi ba'i phyir dang g.yung drung phyir// de ni
68b4(mdo 'grel): yid kyi rang bzhin gyis// lus kyi skye med rtag pa'i phyir// bsam gyis mi khyab bsgyur ba yis// 'chi 'pho brtan phyir de mi 'chi// bag chags phra mo'i nang rnams kyis// gnod med zhi ba nyid kyi phyir// zag meng mngon par 'dus byas
68b5(mdo 'grel): kyis// g.yung drung phyir na rku ba mdo// dri la tshig gnyis de bzhin gnyis// gnyis dang gnyis kyis go rim bzhin// 'dus ma byas pa'i dbyings la ni// rtag pa la sogs don shes bya// mi zad yon tan dang ldan phyir// gzhan
68b6(mdo 'grel): 'gyur min bdag rtag pa'i don// mtha' yi mu dang mtshungs pa'i phyir// skyabs kyi bdag nyid brtan pa'i don// rnam par mi rtog rang bzhin phyir// gnyis med chos nyid zhi ba'i don// ma bcos yon tan nyid phyir ni// 'jig med don ni g.yung
69a1(mdo 'grel): drung nyid// gang phyir de ni chos sku de ni de bzhin gshegs// de ni 'phags pa'i bden pa don dam mya ngan 'das// de phyir nyi dad zer bzhin yon tan dbyer med pas// sangs rgyas nyid las ma gtogs mya ngan 'das pa med// mdor na zag med
69a2(mdo 'grel): dbyings la ni// don gyi rab tu dbye ba bzhis// chos kyi sku la sogs pa yi// rnam grangs bzhir ni rig par bya// sangs rgyas chos dbyer med pa dang // de rigs de bzhin thob pa dang // brdzun med slu med chos nyid dang // 'dod nas rang bzhin zhi nyid// /
69a3(mdo 'grel): rnam kun mngon par byang chub dang // dri ma bag chags bcas spangs pa// sangs rgyas mya ngan 'das pa dag/ dam pa'i don du gnyis med nyid// rnam pa thams cad grangs med pa// bsam med dri med yon tan dang // dbyer med mtshan nyid
69a4(mdo 'grel): thar pa ste// thar pa gang de de bzhin gshegs// ji ltar ri mo 'di byed pa// gzhan dang gzhan la mkhas pa dag/ gang zhig yan lag gang shes pa// de gzhan nges 'dzin med par 'gyur// de nas 'di la khyed kun gyis// nga yi gzun
69a5(mdo 'grel): ni gyis shig ces// mnga' bdag rgyal pos de dag la// bka' yos ras ni byin pa na// de nas de ni thos gyur te// ri mo'i las la rab sbyor ro// de las mngon par sbyor rnams las// gcig cig yul gzhan song gyur na// de ni/
69a6(mdo 'grel): yul gzhan song bas na/ de ma tshang phyir ri mo de// yan lag thams cad yongs rdzogs par// mi 'gyur bzhin zhes dper byas so// de rnams 'dra byed gang yin pa// sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod la sogs// rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan pa//
69b1(mdo 'grel): stong pa nyid ni gzugasu brjod// shes rab ye shes rnam grol rnams// gsal dang 'phro dang dag phyir dang // tha dadang med phyir 'od dang zer// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor rnams dang mtshungs// des na sangs rgyas ma thob par// mya ngan 'das pa mi
69b2(mdo 'grel): thob ste// 'od dang 'od zer srungs nas ni// nyi ma lta bar mi nus bzhin// de ltar rgyal ba'i snying po ni// rnam gzhag rnam pa bcu zhes brjod// nyon mongs sbubs nang gnas pa de// dpe dag gis ni shes par bya// sangs rgyas pade nang sbrang rtsi sgang
69b3(mdo 'grel): ma la/ spun la snying po mi gtsang nang na gser// sa la gter dang myug sogs 'bras phyung dang // gos hrul nang na rgyal ba'i sku dang ni// bud med ngan pa'i lho na mi bdag dang // sa la rin chen gzugs yod dzaM lta bur// blo bur nyon
69b4(mdo 'grel): mongs dri mas bsgribs pa yi// sems can rnams lnga de bzhin khams de gnas// dri ma pad+ma sogs chags sbran pa mi gtsang sa 'bras gos hrul dang // sdug bsngal 'bar bas mngon par gdungs pa'i bud med sa yi
69b5(mdo 'grel): khams dang mtshungs// sangs rgyas sbrang rtsi snying po gser dang gter dang n+ya gro rin chen sku// gling bdag mchog dang rin chen gzugs dang dri med khams mchog mtshungs pa nyid// ji ltar mdog ngan pad+ma'i khong gnas pa//
69b6(mdo 'grel): mtshan stong gis 'bar de bzhin gshegs pa ni// dri med lha yi mig ldan mi mthong nas// chu skyes 'dab ma'i sbubs na 'byin byed pa// de bzhin bde gshegs mnar med gnas rnams la// sangs rgyas spyan gyis rang chos
70a1(mdo 'grel): nyid gzigs te// sgrib med phyi mtha'i mur gnas snying rje yi// bdag can sgrib pa las ni sgrol bar byed// ji ltar mi sdug pad+ma zum la bde bar gshegs pa ni// de yi khong gnas lha mig mthong nas 'das
70a2(mdo 'grel): ma gcod byed ltar// chags sdang sogs dri sbubs bsgribs rdzogs sangs snying po 'gro gzigs te// thugs rjes thub pa de bzhin sgrib pa de ni 'joms par mdzad// ji ltar srog chags tshogs bskor sbrang rtsi ni// skyes bu mkhas
70a3(mdo 'grel): pa de don gnyer ba yis// mthong nas de dang thabs kyi srog chags tshogs// kun nas 'bral bar rab tu 'byed pa bzhin// drang srong chen po'i kun mkhyen spyan gyis ni// rigs khams sbrang rtsi dang 'dra 'di gzigs nas// de yi
70a4(mdo 'grel): sgrib pa sbrang ma drang 'dra ba// gtan nas rab tu spong bar mdzad pa yin// ji ltar sbrang rtsi srog chags bye ba khrag khrig stong bsgribs sbrang rtsi don gnyir mos// sbrang ma de dag bsal te ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du sbrang rtsi'i bya
70a5(mdo 'grel): byed pa// de bzhin lus can la yod zag pa med pa'i shes pa sbrang ma'i rtsi dang 'dra// nyon mongs sbrang ma dang 'dra de 'joms pa la mkhas pa'i rgyal ba skyes bu bzhin// ji ltar spyan ldan 'bru yi snying po ni// mi rnams kyi
70a6(mdo 'grel): ni smad byar mi 'gyur ba// zas sogs don du gnyer ba gang yin pa// de dag gis ni spyan nas de 'byir ltar// de bzhin sems can la yod nyon mongs kyi// dri ma dang 'dis rgyal ba'ang ji srid du// nyon mongs dri ma
70b1(mdo 'grel): 'dres la ma grol ba// de srid rgyal mdzad srid gsum du mi byed// ji ltar sa lu bya 'o nas 'bru'i snying po sngun las ma byung gla ma can// legs par ma bsgrubs snying po mi rnams kyi ni sbyang bya bza' ba zhim por mi 'gyur ltar//
70b2(mdo 'grel): de bzhin sems can la yod chos kyi dbang phyug nyon mongs spun las ma grol lus// nyon mongs bru bas nyen pa'i 'gro la chos kyi dga' ba'i ro stir 'gyur ba min// ji ltar rab tu rgya tshe mi yi gser// ldan lto ni rul pa'i
70b3(mdo 'grel): gnas su lhung gyur la// mi 'jigs chos can de ni der de bzhin// lo brgya mang po dag tu gnas pa de// lha mig rnam dag dang ldan lha yi der// mthong nas mi la 'di na yod pa'i gser// rin chen mchog 'di sbyangs te
70b4(mdo 'grel): rin chen gyis// sgrub par bya ba gyis zhes smra ba ltar// de bzhin thub pas mI gtsang dang 'dra yi// nyon mongs su bying sems can yon tan ni// gzigs nas nyon mongs 'dam de dag bya'i phyir// skye dgu rnams la drag
70b5(mdo 'grel): chos chu char 'bebs// ji ltar ldan ljin rul pa'i gnasu lhung ba'i gser ni lha yis mthong gyur nas// kun tu dog par bya phyir mchog tu mdzes pas mi la nan gyis ston pa ltar// de bzhin rgyal po'i nyon mongs mi
70b6(mdo 'grel): gtsang chen por lhung gyur rdzogs sangs rin po che// sems can rnams la gzigs nas de dag bya phyir lus can rnams la chos ston to// ji ltar mi dbul khyim nang sa 'og nas// mi zad pa yi gtor ni yod gyur la// mi de
71a1(mdo 'grel): de ma shes shing gter de yang // de la nga 'drir yod ces mi smra ltar// de bzhin yid kyi rang chung rin chen gter// dri med bzhag dang bsal med chos nyid kyang // ma rtogs pas na dbul ba'i sdug bsngal ni// rnam mang
71a2(mdo 'grel): rgyun tu skye dgu 'dis myong ngo // ji ltar dbul po'i khyim nang du ni rin chen gter chud gyur pa'i mi la ni// rin chen gtar bdag yod ces brjod par mi byed de ni mi yis shes min ltar// de bzhin chos gter yid kyi khyim gnas se
71a3(mdo 'grel): deg ni dbul po lta bu ste// de dag rnams kyis de thob bya phyir 'jig rten du ni drang srong yang dag bltams// ji ltar a mra la sogs shing 'bras la// yod pa'i sa bon myu gu 'jig med chos// sa rmos chu sogs ldan las ljon shi
71a4(mdo 'grel): gi/ rgyal po'i dngos po rim gyis 'grub pa ltar// sems can rnams kyi ma rig sogs 'bras kyi// pags sbubs nang chung chos khams dge ba yang // de bzhin dge ba de de la brten nas// rim gyis thub pa'i rgyal po'i dngos por
71a5(mdo 'grel): 'gyur// chu dang nyi ma'i 'od dang rlung dang sa dusa? na mkha'i rkyen rnams kyi// ta la dang ni e mra'i 'bras spu bsdu gseb nas shing skye ji lta bar// sems can nyon mongs 'bras lpags nung chud rdzogs sangs sa bon myu gu yang //
71a6(mdo 'grel): de bzhin dag rkyen de dang de las chos 'thon 'phel bar 'gyur ba yin// ji ltar rin chen las byas rgyal ba'i gzugs// gos hru la dri ngan gyis ni gtums gyur pa// lam gnas lha yis mthong nas grol bya'i phyir// lam gnas
71b1(mdo 'grel): don de de la smra ba ltar// de bzhin thob med rnam pa sna tshogs kyi// nyon mongs kyis gtums bde gshegs dngos po nyid// dud 'gro la yang gzigs nas de bzhin de// thar par bya'i don du thabs ston mdzad// ji ltar rin chen
71b2(mdo 'grel): rang bzhin de bzhin gshegs sku dri dad kyis gtums pa// lam gnas lha yis mig gis mthong nas mthar phyin mi la ston pa ltar de bzhin// nyon mongs gos hrul gyis gtums 'khor ba'i lam na gnas pa'i khams//
71b3(mdo 'grel): dud 'gro la yang gzigs nas thar bar bya phyir rgyal bas chos ston to// de ltar mi mo gzugs ngan mgon med 'ga'// mgon med 'dug gnasu ni 'dug gyur la// mngal gyis rgyal po'i dpal ni 'dzin byed pas// rang ljon
71b4(mdo 'grel): yod mi bdag mi shes ltar// srid par skye ba mgon med khyim bzhin te// ma dag sems can mngal ldan bud med bzhin// de la gang zhig yod pas mgon bcas pa// dri med khams ni de yi mngal gnas bzhin// ji ltar
71b5(mdo 'grel): bud med lus la dri bcas gos gon mi sdug ldan pa// sa bdag mngal na gnas kyang mgon ming khang par sdug bsngal mchog myong ltar// de bzhin bdag rang nang gnas mgon yod gyur kyang mgon med blo ldan pa// 'gro ba
71b6(mdo 'grel): nyon mongs dbang gis yid ma zhi ba sdug bsngal gzhi la gnas// ji ltar nang gi gser zhun gzugs rgyas pa// zhi ba phyi rol sa yi rang bzhin can mthong nas// de shes pa dag nang gi gser// sbyangs phyir phyi rol sgrib pa
72a1(mdo 'grel): sel byed ltar// rang bzhin 'od gsal dri ma rnams kyang ni// glo bur bar ni rnam par gzigs gyur nas// rin chen 'byung gnas lta bu'i 'gro ba rnams// sgrib pa dag las sbyong mdzad byang chub mchog/ ji ltar dri med
72a2(mdo 'grel): gser 'bar las byas sa yi nang du chud gyur gzugs// zhi de ring bzhin mkhas pas rig nas sa dag sel bar byed pa ltar// de bzhin kun mkhyen dag pa'i gser 'dra zhi ba'i yid ni mkhyen gyur nas// chos 'chang tshul gyi rdegs spyad sgrub pas
72a3(mdo 'grel): sgrib pa dag ni sel ba mdzad// pad+ma srog chags bung pa dang // sbun pa dang ni mi gtsangs// 'bras shun gos hrul bud med kyi// mngal dang sa yi sbubs na yang // sangs rgyas sbrang rtsi snying po bzhin// gser bzhin gter bzhin ldan pa
72a4(mdo 'grel): bzhin// rin chen sku dang 'khor lo yi// sgyu ba bzhin dang gser gzugs bzhin// sems can khams kyi nyon mongs sbubs// ma 'brel thog ma med pa na// sems kyi rang bzhin dri med ni// thog ma med pa yin par brjod// chags dang /
72a5(mdo 'grel): sdang dang rmongs dang de'i// kun ldang drag dang bag chags dang // mthong sgom lam sbyangs ma dag dang // dag pa'i sa la brten pa yi// dri ma rnam dgu pad+ma yi// sbubs sogs dpes ni rab bstan te// nye ba'i nyon mongs
72a6(mdo 'grel): sbubs kyi ni// dbye bas bye ba mtha' las 'das// chags sogs nyon mongs dgu po 'di// mdor bsdus nas ni go rim bzhin// pad+ma'i sbubs la sogs pa yi// dpe dgu dag gis yang dag bstan// dri 'di dag gis byis rnams
72b1(mdo 'grel): dang // dgra bcom slob dang blo ldan rnams// rim bzhin bzhi dang gcig dang ni// gnyis dang gnyis kyi ma dag nyid// ji ltar pad+ma 'angam skyes de// mdun du gyur na yid dga' dang // phyi nas dga' ba med gyur na// 'dod chags dga'
72b2(mdo 'grel): ba de bzhin no// ji ltar srog chags sbrang ma ni// shin tu 'khrugs te mdun sdig ltar// de bzhin zhe sdang skye ba na// snying la sdug bsngal skyed par byed// ji ltar 'bras sogs snying po ni// phyi rol sbun pas bsgribs pa ltar// de
72b3(mdo 'grel): bzhin snying po'i don mthong ba// ma rig sgo nga'i sbubs kyis bsgribs// ji ltar mi gtsang mi mthun pa// de bzhin chags dang bcas rnams kyi// 'dod pa bsten pa'i rgyu yin phyir// kun nas sdang ba mI gtsang 'dra// ji ltar nor ni
72b4(mdo 'grel): bsgribs pas na// mi shes gter ni mi 'thob ltar// de bzhin skye la rang byung nyid// ma rig bgra chags sa yis bsgribs// ji ltar myug sogs rim skyes pas ka sa bon shun pa gcod bltar// de bzhin de nyid mthong ba yis// mthong
72b5(mdo 'grel): spangs rnams ni ldog par 'gyur// 'phags pa'i lam dang 'brel pa lngas// 'jig tshogs snying po bcom rnams kyi// sgom lam ye shes spangs bya rnams// gos hrul dag dang mtshungs par bstan// sa bdun la brten
72b6(mdo 'grel): dri ma ni// mngal sbubs dri ma dag dang mtshungs// mngal sbubs brel 'dra mi rtogs pa'i// ye shes rnam par smin pa bzhin// sa gsum rjes 'brel dri ma rnams// sa 'dam gos bzhin shes bya ste// bdag nyid chen po rdo rje
73a1(mdo 'grel): lha'i// ting nge 'dzin gyi grwazhom bya yin// de ltar chags sogs dri ma dgu// pad+ma la sogs dag dang mtshungs// rang bzhin gsum gyis bsdus phyir khams// sangs rgyas sogs dang chos mtshungs so// 'di yar
73a2(mdo 'grel): bzhin chos sku dang // de bzhin nyid dang rigs kyang ste// de ni dpe gsum gcig dang ni// lnga rnams kyis ni shes par bya// chos sku rnam gnyis shes bya ste// chos dbyings shin tu dri med dang // de yi rgyu mthu zab pa dang // sna tshogs
73a3(mdo 'grel): tshul ni ston pa'o// 'jig rten 'das phyir 'jig rten na// 'di la dpe ni mi dmigs pas// de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang khams// 'dra ba nyid du bstan po yin// phra mo zab mo'i tshul bstan ni// sbrang rtsi ro gcig pa bzhin te// rnam pa sna
73a4(mdo 'grel): tshogs tshul bstan ni// sna tshogs spobs snying bzhin shes bya// rang bzhin 'gyur ba med pa dang // dge dang rnam par dag pa'i phyir// de bzhin nyid ni 'di gser gyi ni// gzugs dang mtshungs par brjed pa yin// gter dang 'bris
73a5(mdo 'grel): bu'i shing bzhin du// rigs de rnam gnyis shes bya ste// theg med rang bzhin gnas pa dang // yang dag blangs pa mchog nyid do// rigs 'di gnyis las sangs rgyas kyi// sku gsum thob par 'dod pa yin// dang pos sku ni dang/
73a6(mdo 'grel): po ste/ gnyis pa yis ni phyi ma gnyis// ngo bo nyid sku mdzes pa ni// rin chen sku 'drar shes bya ste// rang bzhin gyis ni byas min dang // yon tan rin chen gter yin phyir// chos chen rgyal srid che ldan phyir// rdzog longs
73b1(mdo 'grel): 'khor los bsgyur bzhin no// gzugs brnyan gyis ni rang bzhin phyir// sprul pa gser gyi gzugs lta bu// rang byung rnams kyi don dam ste// dad pa nyid kyis rtogs bya ste// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'ong 'bar ba// mig med pas
73b2(mdo 'grel): ni mthong ba med do// 'di la gsal bya ci yang med// bzhag par blo ba cung zed med// yang dag nyid la yang dag lta// yang dag mthong na rnam par grol// rnam dbye bcas pa'i mtshan nyid can// glo bur dag gis khams stong gi// rnam
73b3(mdo 'grel): dbye med pa'i mtshan nyid can// blo med chos kyis stong ma yin// sprin dang rmi lam sgyu bzhin de dang der// shes bya thams cad rnams kun stong pa zhes// gsungs nas yang 'di rgyal rnams sems can la// sangs rgyas snying
73b4(mdo 'grel): po yod ces cis te gsungs// sems zhum sems can dman la brnyas pa dang // yang dag min 'dzin yang dag chos la skur// bag chags ga pa'i skyon lnga gang dag la// yod pa de dag de spong don du gsungaso// yang
73b5(mdo 'grel): ngag mtha' ni 'dus byas kyi// rnam pa thams cad dben pa ste// nyon mongs las dang rnam smin don// sprin la sogs pa bzhin du brjod// nyon mongs sprin 'dra bya ba yin// las ni rmi lAm longs spyod bzhin// nyon mongs las kyi
73b6(mdo 'grel): rnam par smin// phung po sgyu ma sprul pa bzhin// sngar ni de ltar rnam bzhag nas// slar yang bla ma'i rgyud 'dir ni// nyes pa lnga dag spang ba'i phyir// khams yo nga nyid ces bstan pa yin// 'di ltor de ni ma thos pas// bdag la
74a1(mdo 'grel): brnyas pa'i nyes pa yis// sems ni zhum pa 'ga' zhig la// byang chub sems ni skye mi 'gyur// gang la byang chub sems skyes pas// bdag ni mchog ces rlom pa na// byang chub sems ma skyes pa la// dman
74a2(mdo 'grel): pa'i 'du shes rab tu 'jug// de ltar sems pa de la ni// yang dag shes pa mi skye bo// des na yang dgo mi 'dzin zhing // yang dag don ni rigs mi 'gyur// bcos ma glo bur ba nyid phyir// sems can skyon de yang dag min// yung
74a3(mdo 'grel): dag nyes de bdag med pa// yon tan rang bzhin dag pa yin// yang dag min blo nye 'dzin zhing // yang dag ljon skur 'debs pas// blo ldan bdag dang sems can ni// mtshungs mthong byams pa thob mi 'gyur// 'di las de ni thos
74a4(mdo 'grel): sa// smad dang nan pa bzhin lus dang // shes rab ste shes byams chen b+he// ts+tshaswAm+b+ha skyes phyir de las na// ban ma tho ma mAdzA su k+Sha// snron snad yon tang ldan po dang // bdag pang sems can mardungs
74a5(mdo 'grel): // rten sa na/ mchon smonas smra gyus// rna
74a6(mdo 'grel): 'i du mi chen pa yi na// du da/ du pa na pa nga la pa// pa /
74b1(mdo 'grel): rnam par gnas// rang bzhin 'od gsal zhes brjod gang yin nyid dang mkha' bzhin glo bur gyi// nyon mongs shes bya'i sprin tshogs stug po'i sgrib pa yi ni bsgribs gyur pa'i// dri med sangs rgyas yon tan kun ldan rtag brtan
74b2(mdo 'grel): g.yung drung sangs rgyas nyid// de ni chos la mi rtog rnam 'byed ye shes dag la brten nas 'thob// sangs rgyas nyid ni dbyer med pa// dag pa'i chos kyis rab phye ba// nyi mkha' bzhin te ye shes dang // spangs pa gnyis kyi mtshan
74b3(mdo 'grel): nyid do// 'od gsal byas min dbyer med par// 'jug can gang+gA'i klung gi ni// rdul las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyi// chos rnams kun dang ldan pa nyid// rang bzhin gyis ni ma grub dang // khyab dang glo bur ba nyid kyis// nyon
74b4(mdo 'grel): mongs shes bya'i sgri ba der// smon dang 'dra bar brjod pa yin// sgrib pa gnyis dang bral ba yi// rgyu ni ye shes gnyis yin te// mi rtogs pa dang de yi ni// rjes thob de ni ye shes 'dod// dri med chu ldan rim rgyas pad+ma/
74b5(mdo 'grel): khebs pa'i mtsho bzhin dang // sgra gcan kha nas thar pa'i zla ba nya ba lta bu dang // sprin tshogs nyon mongs dag las grol ba'i nyi ma lta bur ni// dri med yon tan ldan phyir 'od zer snang ldan de nyid do// thub pa khyu mchog
74b6(mdo 'grel): sbrang rtsi snying po dang // rin chen gser dang gter dang ljon shing bzhin// dri med rin chen bde gshegs sku dang ni// sa bdag gser gyi gzugs 'dra rgyal ba nyid// chu mtsho sogs bzhin 'dod chags sogs// glo bur nyon mongs//
75a1(mdo 'grel): dag pa ni// mdor na mi rtog ye shes kyi// 'bras bu yin par rab tu brjod// rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan pa// sangs rgyas sku ni nges thob pa// ye shes 'bras bu yin par bshad// 'dod chags rdul ni spangs phyir
75a2(mdo 'grel): dang // gdul bya yi ni pad+ma la// bsam gtan chu ni 'bab phyir dang // chu dag rdzing dang mtshungs pa yin// zhe sdang skya gcan las grol bsdu// snying rje byams chen 'od zer gyis// 'gro ba khyab pa'i phyir na de// dri med zla ba nye bA bzhin// gaut+ti
75a3(mdo 'grel): mug sprin las rnam grol bas// 'gro bar ye shes 'od zer gyis// mun pa sel phyir sangs rgyas nyid// de ni dr-i med nyi ma bzhin// mi mnyam mnyam pa'i chos phyir dang // dam tshes ro ni sbyin mjed dang // shun pa dang ni bral phyir de//
75a4(mdo 'grel): bde gshegs sbrang rtsi snying po bzhin// gang phyir yon tan rdzas kyi ni// dbul ba sil b+ha byed phyir dang // rnam grol 'bras bu sbyin byed phyir// gser dang gte dang ljon shing bzhin// rin chen chos kyi sku phyir dang // rkang gnyis
75a5(mdo 'grel): bdag po phyogs phyir dang // rin chen gzugs kyi rnam pa'i phyir// de ni rin chen rgya lo gsor bzhin// zag pa med khyab 'dzeg medo chos can te// brtan+da zhi brtag sde 'pho med gnas yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa mkha'
75a6(mdo 'grel): bzhin dam pa yi// dbang po drug don nyam su myong ba'i rgyu// 'byong med gzugs don lta dang gtam bzang ni// gtsang mo nyan dang bde gshegs tshul khrims kyi// dri gceng snom dang 'phags chen dam chos ro// myong dang ting
75b1(mdo 'grel): 'dzin reg bde nyams myong dang // rang gi ngo bo nyid kyi za ba'i tshul// rtog pa'i rgyur gyur zhim mor bsams pas na// don dam bde mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa ni// nam mkha' bzhin du rgyu mtshan rnams dang bral// mdor na ye
75b2(mdo 'grel): shes gnyis po yi// las su 'di ni shes bya ste// grol ba'i sku ni rdzogs pa dang // chos kyi sku ni sbyong ba'o// rnam grol chos kyi sku dag ni// rnam gnyis rnam gcig shes bya ste// zag pa ming phyir khyab pa'i phyir// 'dus ma byas kyi
75b3(mdo 'grel): gnas nyid phyir// nyon mongs rnams ni bag tshogs dang // bcas pa 'gags phyir zag med de// chags med thogs pa med pa'i phyir// ye shes khyab pa nyid du 'dod// gtan du 'jig pa med po yi// radwa bzhin yin phyir 'dus
75b4(mdo 'grel): ma byas// 'jig med nyid ni bstan pa ste// bstan sogs rnams kyis de bshad do// 'jigs pa rnam bzhir shes bya ste// bstan sogs dag las bzlog phyir// myags dang rnam 'gyur chad pa dang // bsam mi khyab sbyar 'pho ba ste// de
75b5(mdo 'grel): medo phyir na brtan zhi dang // rtag dang 'pho med shes par bya// dri med shes te dkar po yi// chos kyi rten yin phyir na glanas// ji ltar rgyu min na mkha' nau// gzugs mthong ba dang sgra dang dri// ro dang reg dang chos rnams ni// thos
75b6(mdo 'grel): la sogs pa'i rgyu yin ltar// de bzhin sku gnyis sgrib med pa'i// sbyor bas brtan pa'i dbang don la// zag pa med pa'i yon tan dag/ skye ba yi rgyu yin no// bsam med rtag pa brtan zhing g.yung drung nyid// rab tu zhi khyab rtog bral
76a1(mdo 'grel): nam mkha' bzhin// chags med kun du thogs med rtsub reg spangs// blta bzung med dge sangs rgyas dri ma med// rnam grol chos kyi sku dag gis// rang dang gzhan gyis don bstan te// rang bzhin don rten de la ni//
76a2(mdo 'grel): bsam mi khyab sogs yon tan ldan// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yul// sangs rgyas shes gsum yul min phyir// ye shes lus can rnams kyis ni// bsam mi khyab par rtogs par bya// phra phyir thos pa'i yul min te//
76a3(mdo 'grel): don dam yin phyir bsam bya'i min// chos nyid zab phyir 'jig rten pa'i// sgom pa la sogs yul ma yin// gdu phyir gzugs la dmus long bzhin// byis pas de sngon mthong ma myong // btsas pa'i khyi mo gnas bu chung gis// nyi ma'i
76a4(mdo 'grel): gzugs bzhin 'phags pas kyang // skye dang bral phyir rtag pa ste// 'gag pa med phyir brtan pa yin// gnyis medo phyir de zhi ba ste// g.yung drung chos nyid gnas phyir ro// rab zhi 'gog pa'i bden pa'i phyir// thams ci de rtogs phyir
76a5(mdo 'grel): khyab pa nyid// gnas pa med phyir rtog med do// nyon mongs spangs phyir chags pa med// shes bya'i sgrib kun+da dag pa'i phyir// thams cad du ni thogs pa med// gnyis med laspu rung ba'i phyir// rtsub pa'i reg dang bral ba yin//
76a6(mdo 'grel): ngo gzugs meng phyir bltar mod de// mtshan ma med phyir bzung du medado// dge ba rang bzhin dag pa'i phyir// dri med dri ma spangs phyir ro// thog ma dbus mtha' med cing rnam dbyer med// gnyis med gsum bral dri ming rnam rtog
76b1(mdo 'grel): med// chos dbyings rang bzhin gang yin de rtogs pa// mnyam par bzhag pa'i rnal 'byor pa yis mthong // gzhal med gang ga'i bye ma las 'das pa// bsam med mnyam med yon tan rnams dang ldan// de bzhin gsheDa
76b2(mdo 'grel): pa'i dri med dbyings de ni// bag chags bcas pa'i nyes pa rnams spangs pa'o// sna tshogs dam chos 'od zer mnga' ba'i skus// 'gro ba'i rnam grol don grub la brtson pa// mdzad pa yid bzhin nor bu'i rgyal bzhin
76b3(mdo 'grel): te// sna tshogs dngos dang de yi rang bzhin min// 'jig rten zhi ba'i lam la 'jug pa dang // rab tu smin dang lung ston rgyu yi gzugs// gang yin de yang 'dir ni rtag gnas te// nam mkha'i khamasu gzugs kyi khams bzhi no//
76b4(mdo 'grel): rang 'byung rnams kyi thams cad mkhyen// sangs rgyu ste nyid ces gang brjod pa// mchog tu mya ngan 'das bsam med// dgra bcom so so'i bdag gyur pa// de dbye zlab dang rgya che dang // bdag nyid chen po'i yon tan gyi// chos
76b5(mdo 'grel): kyis rab phye rang bzhin la// sogs pa'i sku gsum dag gis 'jug/ de la sangs rgyas rnams kyi ni// ngo bo nyid sku mtshan nyid lnga// mdor na yon tan lnga dong ni// ldan pa nyid du rig par bya// 'dus ma byas shing rnam dbyer med
76b6(mdo 'grel): mtha' gnyis dag ni rnam par spangs// nyon mongs shes bya snyoms 'jug gi/ sgrib gsum las ni nges grol te// dri med rnam par rtog med dang // rnal 'byor rnams kyi yul yin phyir// chos dbyings ngo bo nyid kyis ni// dag
77a1(mdo 'grel): pa'i phyir na 'od gsal ba// gzhal med grangs med bsam med pa// mnyam med dag pa'i mthar thug pa// yon tan rnams dang yang dag par// ngo bo nyid kyi sku ldan te// rgya che'i phyir dang grangs med
77a2(mdo 'grel): phyir// rtog ge'i yul ni mini phyir dang // 'ba' zhig bag chags bcas spangs phyir// gzhal med la sogs go rim bzhin// sna tshogs chos la rdzogs longs spyod// rang bzhin chos ni snang phyir dang // thugs rje dag
77a3(mdo 'grel): po'i rgyu 'thun pa// 'gro don rgyun mi 'chad phyir dang // rnam par rtog med lhun grub par// 'dod pa ji bzhin yongs skong phyir// yid bzhin nor bu'i rdzu 'phrul gyis// rdzogs pa'i longs spyod rnam par gnas// brjod ston
77a4(mdo 'grel): mdzad rgyun mi 'chad dang // mngon par 'du byed med pa dang // de yi ngo bor mon ston pa// 'dir ni sna tshogs rnam lngar brjod// ji ltar tshon ni sna tshogs kyis// nor bu de dngos min snang ltar// de bzhin 'gro skyen sna tshogs
77a5(mdo 'grel): pas// khyab bdag de dngos min par snang // thugs rje chen pos 'jig rten mkhyen// 'jig rten kun la gzigs nas ni// chos kyi sku las ma g.yos par// sprul pa'i rang bzhin sna tshogs kyis// skye bo mngon par
77a6(mdo 'grel): skye ba dang // dga' ldan nas ni 'pho ba dang // lhum su 'jug dang bltams pa dang // bzo yi gnas la mkhas pa dang // btsun mo'i 'khor dgyes rol pa dang // ngos 'byung dka' ba spyod pa dang // byang chub snying por
77b1(mdo 'grel): gshegs pa dang // bdud sde 'joms dang rdzogs par ni// byang chug chos kyi 'khor lo dang // mya ngan 'das par gshegs mjed rnams// yongs su ma dag zhing rnams// srid pa ji srid gnas par ston// mi rtag sdug
77b2(mdo 'grel): bsngal bdag med dang // zhi ba'i sgra yis thabs mkhyen pa// sems can srid gsum skyo bskyed nas// mya ngan 'das la rab 'jug mdzad// zhi ba'i lam la rab tu zhugs pa// mya ngan 'das thob 'du shes can//
77b3(mdo 'grel): dam chos pad+ma dkar la sogs// chos kyi de nyid bstan po yis// de dag sngar 'dzin las bzlog ste// thabs dang shes rab yongs bzung bas// theg pa mchog la smin mdzad de// byang chub mchog tu lung ston to//
77b4(mdo 'grel): zab dang mthu ni phun tshogs dang // byis pa'i don mthun rab 'dren phyir// 'di dag grangs bzhin zab pa dang // rgya che'i bdag nyid shes par bya// 'dir ni dang po chos sku ste// phyi ma dag ni gzugs kyi sku// na mkhra' lnga ni
77b5(mdo 'grel): gzugs gnas bzhin// dang po la ni tho ma gnas// sgyu mtha' yas dong sems can zad med dang // brtse dang 'phrul dang mkhyen dang phun tshogs ldan// chos kyi dbang phyug 'tsho ba'i bdud bco ma dang // ngo bo med phyir 'jig rten
77b6(mdo 'grel): mgon po rtag/ lus dang srog dang longs spyod rnams// btang nas dam chos 'dzin phyir dang // sems can kun la phan po'i phyir// dang po'i dam bca' mthar 'byin phyir// sangs rgyas nyid la gtsang ba dang // dag pa'i
78a1(mdo 'grel): thugs rje rab 'jug phyir// rdzu 'phrul rkang pa ston pa ni// de yis gnas par spyod pa'i phyir// mkhyen pas 'khor dang mya ngan 'das// gnyis su 'dzin las grol ba'i phyir// rtag tu bsam yas ting 'dzin gyi// /
78a2(mdo 'grel): bde ba phun sum tshogs ldan phyir// 'jig rten na ni spyod pa na// 'jig rten chos kyis gos med phyir// 'tsho med zhi bo'i gnas thob la// 'chi bdud rgyu ba med pa'i phyir// 'dus ma byas pa'i rang bzhin gyis// thub pa gdod nas rab
78a3(mdo 'grel): zhi'i phyir// rtag pa skyabs maud rnams kyi ni// skyabs la sogs par 'thang phyir ro// drang po yi ni rgyu bdun gyis// gzugs kyi sku ni rtag nyid de// phye ma gsum gyis ston pa ni// chos kyi sku yis rtag pa nyid// dag yul min phyir don
78a4(mdo 'grel): dam gyis bsdus phyir// rtog gnas min phyir dpalam 'das pa'i phyir// bla na med phyir srid zhis ma bsdus phyir// rgyal yul 'phags rnamasau kyis kyang bsam mi khyab// bsam med brjod du med phyir de// brjod med don dem
78a5(mdo 'grel): yin phyir ro// don dam rtag bya min phyir te// brtag min rjes dpag bya min phyir// dpag med bla na med pa'i phyir// bla na med pa ma bsdus phyir// ma bsdus gnas po med phyir de// yon tan skyon rtog med phyir ro// rgyu lnga dag
78a6(mdo 'grel): gis phra ba'i phyir// chos sku bsam mi khyab pa ste// drug pas de yi dngos min phyir// gzugs sku bsam mi khyab pa'o// bla med ye shes thugs rje che sogs yon tan gyi// yon tan pha rol byon po'i rgyal ba bas ma me khyab//
78b1(mdo 'grel): desnga na rang byung rnams kyi tha ma'i tshul 'di ni// drang srong chen po dbang thob rnams kyis kyang rig min// theg pa chen po'i rgyud bla ma'i bstan bac+doMs dkon mchog gi rigs rnam par dbye ba las/ byang chub kyis skabs te
78b2(mdo 'grel): gnyis pa'o// // rang don gzhan don don dam sku dang ni// de la brten pa'i kun rdzob sku nyid de// bral dang rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu ni// yon tan dbye ba drug cu bzhi 'di dag/ bdag nyid kyis ni sbyor ba'i gnas//
78b3(mdo 'grel): dam pa'i don gyi sku yin te// drang srong rnams kyi brda yi sku// pha rol phun sum tshogs pa'i gnas// dang po'i sku ni stobs la sogs// bral ba'i yon tan rnams dang ldan// gnyis pa skyes bu chen po'i mtshan// rnam smin
78b4(mdo 'grel): yon tan dgra dang ldan// stobs nyid ma rig sgrib la rdo rje bzhin// mi 'jigs nyid ni 'khor du seng ge bzhin// de bzhin gshegs pa'i ma 'dres mkha' bzhin te// thub pa'i bstan pa rnam gnyis chu zla bzhin// gnas
78b5(mdo 'grel): dang gnas min las rnams kyi// rnam smin dang ni dbang po dang // khams rnams dang ni mos pa dang // kun 'gro'i lam dang byasam gtan sogs// nyon mongs dri ma med pa dang // gnas ni rjes su dran pa dang // lha yi
78b6(mdo 'grel): mig dang zhi ba dag/ mkhyen pa'i stobs ni rnam pa bcu// gnas dang gnas min rnam smin khams dang 'gro ba'i mos pa sna tshogs dang // nyon mongs rnam byang dbang po'i tshogs dang sngon gnas rjes su dran pa dang // lha
79a1(mdo 'grel): yi mig dang zag pa zad tshul mi shes go cha rtsig brtan dang // shing rnams 'bigs dang gzhig dang gcod phyir stobs gang yin pa rdo rje bzhin// chos kun rdzogs par byang chub dang // gegs ni 'gog par
79a2(mdo 'grel): bya ba dang // lam ston pa dang 'gog ston la// mi 'jigs pa ni rnam pa bzhi// bdag gzhan shes bya'i dngos po rnam kun shes dang shes mdzad phyir// spang dngos spong dang spong mdzad phyir dang brten bya brten pa'i phyir// thob
79a3(mdo 'grel): byi bla med shin tu dri med thob dang thob mdzad phyir// rang gzhan don bden gsung phyir drang srong gang du'ang thogs pa med// ri dgas dbang po ji ltar nags mthar rtags 'jigs med// ri dgas rnams la skrag po med par
79a4(mdo 'grel): rgyu ba ltar// de bzhin tshogs na thub pa'i dbang po seng ge yang // legs gnas ltos med brtan pa'i rtsal dang ldan par gnas// 'khrul dang ca co mi mnga' ste// ston la dran pa nyams mi mnga'// mnyam par ma bzhag thugs mi
79a5(mdo 'grel): mnga'// 'du shes sna tshogs kyang mi mnga'// ma brtags btang snyoms mi mnga' ste// 'dun pa brtson 'grus dran pa dang // shes rab rnam grol rnam grol gyi// ye shes gzigs pa nyams mi mnga'// las rnams ye shes
79a6(mdo 'grel): sngon 'gro dang // dus la ye shes gzigs pa med// de ltar bco brgyad 'di dang gzhan// ston pa'i ma 'dres yon tan yin// 'khrul dang ca co bsnyil dang thugs g.yo tha dad kyi ni 'du shes dang // ngang gis btang snyoms drang srong
79b1(mdo 'grel): la med 'dun pa dang ni brtson 'grus dang // dran dang rnam dag dri med shes rab rtag tu rnam par grol ba dang // shes bya'i don kun gzigs pa grol ba'i ye shes las ni nyams mi mnga'// gang gi las gsum thams cad yis
79b2(mdo 'grel): sngon 'gro rjes su 'jug pa dang // dus gsum rtag tu thogs med nges par mkhyen pa rgya chen 'jug pa ste// gang rtogs 'gro bar 'jig med dam chos 'khor lo chen po rab bskor ba// mthu rje chen po dang ldan rgyal ba nyid nges
79b3(mdo 'grel): sangs rgyas rnams kyis brnyes// sa sogs la yod chos gang yin pa'i cho so nyid de ni na mkha'i min// nam mkha'i mtshan nyid sgrib med la sogs mtshan nyid gang dag gzugs la med// sa chu me rlung na mkha' mtshungs
79b4(mdo 'grel): pa 'jig rten dag ni thun mong ste// ma 'dres nyid ni rdul phran tsam yang 'jig rten dag na thun mong min// legs gnas 'khor los mtshan pa dang // yangs dang zhabs longs mi mngon dang // sor mo ring dang phyag zhub
79b5(mdo 'grel): ni/ dra ba yis ni 'brel pa dang // pags 'jam gzhon sha can legs nyid// sku ni bdun dag mtho ba dang // byin pa I Ne ya 'dra gsang // glang po bzhin du sbubasu nub// ro stod seng ge 'dra ba dang // thal gong bar med
79b6(mdo 'grel): rgyas pa dang // dpung mgo legs zlum phyag 'jam zhing // zlum zhing mthon dman med pa dang // phyag ring yongasuM dag pa'i sku// 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dang ldan dang // mgrin pa dri med dung 'dra dang // 'gram pa ri dgas rgyal
80a1(mdo 'grel): po 'dra// tshems ni bzhi bcu mnyam pa dang // rab drag tshems thags bzang ba dang // rnam dgra tshems mnyam nyid dang ni// mche ba rab mchog dkar ba nyid// ljags ring mtha' med bsam med pa// ro bro ba yi mchog
80a2(mdo 'grel): nyid dang // rang byung ka la bing ka yi// sgra dang tshangs pa'i dbyangs nyid dang // spyan bzang ut+pal khyu mchog rdzi 'dra dang // zhal mdzes dri me dra mdzod spu dkar ldan pa// gtsug tor dbur ldan dag cing srab pa dang // pags pa
80a3(mdo 'grel): gser gyi mdog 'dra sems can mchog/ ba spu legs phra 'jam zhing re re nas// sku yi gyen du g.yas phyogs 'khyil pa dang // dbu skra dri med rin chen mthon mthing bzhin// n+ya gro rdzogs pa'i ljon shing dkyil 'khor 'dra//
80a4(mdo 'grel): kun du bzang po dpe med dang stong che// sred med bu yi stobs mnga' mkhregs pa'i sku// bsam mi khyab 'bar sum cu rtsa gnyis po// 'di dag ston pas mi dbang mtshan du gsungs// ji ltar sprin med na mkha'i zla ba'o/
80a5(mdo 'grel): gzug// ston ka'i chu sngon mtshor ni mthong ba ltar// de bzhin rgyal sras tshogs kyis khyab bdag gzugs// rdzogs sangs dkyil 'khor nang du mthong bar 'gyur// yon tan drug cu rtsa bzhi po// 'di dag so sor rgyur bcas te//
80a6(mdo 'grel): go rim ji bzhin rin chen gyi// mdo yi rjes 'bangs shes par bya// mi phyed pa dang mi zhan dang // mtshungs pa med dang g.yo med phyir// rdo rje seng ge mkha' dag pa// chu yi zla ba'i dpes bstan to// stobs sogs rnams
80b1(mdo 'grel): las stobs drug dang // gsum dang gcig gis rim pa bzhin// shes bya snyoms par 'jug pa dang // brag chags bcas pa kun bsal bas// go tshwa rtsig pa shing bzhin du// phug dang gzhig dang bcad phyir ro// brling dang snying
80b2(mdo 'grel): brtan mi phyed pas// drang srong stobs ni rdo rje 'dra// gang phyir brling pau snying po'i phyir// grang phyir snying po brtan pa'i phyir// gang phyir brtan pa mi phyed phyir// mi phyed phyir na rdo rje bzhin// 'jig maud phyir dang ltos med
80b3(mdo 'grel): phyir// brten phyir rtsal ni phun tshogs pas// thub pas song ge seng ge bzhin// 'khor gyi tshogasu 'jigs mi mnga'o// kun mngon mkhyen pas gang las kyang // 'jigs med par ni rnam par gnas// dag pa'i sems
80b4(mdo 'grel): tson dang yang bdag/ mi mnyam gzigs phyir ltos pa med// thugs ni chos rnams thams cad lA// rtse gcig phyir nu brtan pa nyid// mchog tu ma rig bag chags kyi// sa las brgal phyir rtsal ldan no// 'jig rten nyan tho
80b5(mdo 'grel): mtha' gcig tu// spyod dang blo ldan rang byung rnams// gong nas gong du blo dgra ni// phya phyir dpe ni rnam pa lta// 'jig rten kun gyi nyer 'tsho'i phyir// sa chu me rlung rnams drang mtshungs// 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa yi//
80b6(mdo 'grel): mtshan nyid las 'das na mkha' bzhin// de dag yon tan sum cu ni// gnyis 'di tshosau skus rab phye ste// nor bu rin chen 'od mdog dang // dbyibs bzhin dbye ba med phyir ro// mthong na tshim byed yon tan gang // sum cu
81a1(mdo 'grel): rtsa gnyis zhes bya ba sprul pa chos la rdzogs par ni// longs spyod rtogs sku gnyis la brten// dag las nye dang ring rnams la// 'jig rten rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor du// chu dang na mkhar zla gzugs bzhin//
81a2(mdo 'grel): de mthong ba ni rnam pa gnyis// theg pa chen po rgyud bla ma'i bstan bcos// dkon mchog gi rigs rnam par dbye ba las// yon tan gyi skabs te gsum pa'o// // gdul bya'i khams dang gdul ba'i thabs dang
81a3(mdo 'grel): ni// gdul bya'i khams kyi gdul ba'i bya ba dang // de yi yul dang dus su gshegs pa la// khyab bdag rtag tu lhun gyis grub par 'jug/ yon tan rin chen mchog tshogs dang ldan ye shes chu mchog bsod nams
81a4(mdo 'grel): ye shes nyi 'od can// theg pa ma lus nges par bsgrubs te mtha' dang dpung med rgya chen na mkha' ltar khyab pa// sangs rgyaste nyid ni yon tan dri ma mr-id gter sems can kun la khyad med rnam gzigs nus//
81a5(mdo 'grel): nyon mongs shes bya'i sprin gyi dra bA sangs rgyas rnams kyi thugs rje'i rlung gis rnam par gtor// gang gis gling gis gdul po yi// bya gang gang du gang gi tshe// de yi rnam rtog skye mod phyir// thub pa rtag tu lhun gyi grub
81a6(mdo 'grel): gdul bya'i khams ni gang zhig gis// gdul bya'i thabs mang gang gang gis// gdul bya'i bya gang gang du ni// gang tshe'i yul dang dus de dag/ nges 'byin de yi rton pa dang // des 'bras de yi yongs 'dzin dang //
81b1(mdo 'grel): de'i sgrib de gcod rkyen la ni// rnam par rtog pa med phyir ro// nges par 'byin pa sa bcu ste// tshogs gnyis dgra nI de yi rgyu// de 'bras byang chub mchog yin te// byang chub sems can yongasu 'dzin// de'i sgrib mtha' yas
81b2(mdo 'grel): nyon mongs dang // nye ba'i nyon mongs bag chags so// dus kun du ni de 'joms pa'i// rkyen ni thugs rje chen po yin// gnas drug po ni 'di dag rnams// go r-i ma dzi bzhin rgya mtsho dang // nyi ma dang ni na mkha' gter//
81b3(mdo 'grel): sprin dang rlung bzhin shes par bya// shes chu yon tan rin chen dang // ldan phyir sa rnams rgya mtsho bzhin// sems can thams cad nyer 'tsho'i phyir// tshogs gnyis dag ni nyi ma bzhin// rgya che mtha' dang dbus med
81b4(mdo 'grel): phyir// byang chub na mkha'i khams bzhin no// yang dag rdzogs spangs chos nyid phyir// sems can khams ni gter dang 'dra// glo bur khyab dang mo grub phyir// de yi nyon mongs sprin tshogs bzhin// de 'thor ba ni nyer
81b5(mdo 'grel): gronas phyir// thugs rje mi zad rlung dang 'dra// gzhan gyi dbang gis nges 'byung dang // bdag dang sems can mtshungs gzigs dang // mdzad pa yongs su ma rdzogs phyir// 'khor ba srid du mdzad mi 'chad// ban+d+ha
81b6(mdo 'grel): byin lnga sprin tshangs pa dang // nyi ma nor bu rin chen bzhin// de bzhin gshegs pa sgra brnyan bzhin// nam mkha' dang ni sa bzhin no// ji ltar bai DUr dag pa yi// rang bzhin sa steng 'di gyur te// dag phyir lha yi dab
82a1(mdo 'grel): bo paM/ lha yi bu mo'i tshogs dang bcas// rnam par rgyal ba'i khang bzang dang // lhag nas de las gzhan dag dang // de yi gzhal yas sna tshogs dang // lha rdza sA rnams yang de mthe // denas skyes pa
82a2(mdo 'grel): bud med tshogs// sa yi steng na gnas pa rnams// snang ba de ni mthong gyur te// nged kyang ring por mi thogs par// lha dbang 'di 'drar gyur cig ces// de 'dra'i smon lam 'debs byed cing // de thob don du dges ni// yang dag
82a3(mdo 'grel): bliblangs te gnas par gyur// de dag dge ba'i las des ni// 'di snang tsam zhes de lta bur// shes pa med kyang si steng nas// 'phos te lhar ni skye bar 'gyur// snang ba de ni shin tu yang // rtog pa med cing g.yo ba med//
82a4(mdo 'grel): de lta mod kyi sa steng na/ don chen gyis nI nye bar gnas// de bzhin dang sogs dri med can// dang sogs yon tan bsgoms pa yi// rang sems la snang rdzogs sangs rgyas// mtshan dang dang byad dang ldan pa// 'chags pa
82a5(mdo 'grel): dang ni bzhengs pa dang // bzhugs pa dang ni gzims pa dang // spyod lam sna tshogs mdzad pa can// zhi ba'i chos ni gsung ba dang // mi gsung mnyam par bzhag gyur pa// cho 'phrul rnam pa sna tshigs dang // mjed pa gzi
82a6(mdo 'grel): mdangs chen po can// sems can rnams kyis mthong bar 'gyur// de mthong nas kyang 'dod ldan pa// sangs rgyas nyid phyir rab sbyor te// de rgyu yang dag blangs nas ni// 'dod pa'i go 'phang thob par byed// snang ba de ni shin
82b1(mdo 'grel): du yang // rtog med g.yo ba med pa nyid// de lta na yang 'jig rten na// don chen pos ni nye bar gnas// 'di ni rang sems snang ba bzhin// so so'i skye bos mi shes mod// de lta na yang gzugs mthong ste// de dag la ni don yod
82b2(mdo 'grel): 'gyur// rim gyis de mthong la brten nas// theg pa 'di la gnas pa rnams// nang gi dam pa'i chos sku ni// ye shes mig gis mthong bar 'gyur// ji ltar sa kun nyams nga'i gnas gzhan dang bral dri med bai DUr+ya// gsal
82b3(mdo 'grel): mdzes nor bu'i yon tan dri bral dpal ldan steng ni mnyam gyur te// dag phyir der ni lha bdag sna tshogs lha dbang lha yi gzugs shar ste// rim gyis sa yis yon tan bral phyir de ni slar yang mi snang 'gyur// de dngos
82b4(mdo 'grel): thob phyir bsnyen gnas brtul zhugs nges par sbyin sogs la phyogs pa// bung mar skyes tshogs smon pa'i sems kyis me tog la sogs 'thor ba ltar// dag pa'i bai DUr+ya 'dra'i sems la snang ba'i thub dbang thob
82b5(mdo 'grel): bya'i phyir// rab dge sems ldan rgyal ba'i sras rnams de bzhin sems rab skyed par byed// ji ltar bai DUr sa bzhi gtsang ma la// lha dbang lus kyi gzugs brnyan snang ba ltar// de bzhin 'gro sems sa gzhi gtsang ba la//
82b6(mdo 'grel): thob po'i dbang po'i sku yi gzugs brlan 'char// 'gro bar gzu brnyan 'char nub rnyog mod dang // rnyog pa'i rang sems rab 'jug dbang gis 'jug/ ji ltar 'jig rten dag na gzugs snang ltar// de bzhin yod dbang zhig
83a1(mdo 'grel): ces de mi lta// ji ltar lha nang lha rnams kyis// sngon gyi dkar po'i mthu yis ni// 'bang dang gnas dang yid gzugs dang // rnam par rtog pa med bzhin du// mi rtag sdug bsngal bdag med dang // zhi ba'i sgra yis
83a2(mdo 'grel): bag med pa'i// lha rnams thams cad yang nas yang // chos kyi rdzas ni skul byed ltar// de bzhin khyab bdag 'bad sogs dang // bral yang 'gro ba ma lus pa// sangs rgyas gsung gis khyab mdzad de// skal ldan rnams la chos
83a3(mdo 'grel): ston to// ji ltar lha nang lha rnams kyi// rnga sgra rang gi las las 'byung // de bzhin 'jig rten thub pa'i chos// gsung ba rang gi las las 'byung // 'bad nas lus dang sems bral ba'i// sgra de ji ltar zhi sgrub ltar// de bzhin
83a4(mdo 'grel): 'bad sogs dang bral ba'i// chos de zhi ba sgrub par byed// ji ltar lha yi grong na rnga sgra'i rgyus byung mi 'jigs sbyin pa ni// nyon mongs g.yul du 'jug tshe lha min dpung rgyal rtsed mo sel ba bzhini// de bzhin 'jig rten dag na bsam
83a5(mdo 'grel): gtan gzugs med la sogs rgyus byung ba// sems can nyon mongs sdug bsngal rab 'joms zhi ba bla mod lam tshul brjod// gang phyir skye kun pa nyid dang // phan pade cho 'phrul gsum ldan pa// de phyir thob dbyangs lha rdzas
83a6(mdo 'grel): kyis// sil snyan rnams las khyad par 'phags// lhar ni rnga yi sgra chen po// sar gnas rnams kyi rnar mi 'gro/ sangs rgyas rnga sgra 'khor ba yis// sa 'og 'jig rten dag tu 'gro// lhar ni lha yi sil snyan bye ba mang // 'dod me mngon
83b1(mdo 'grel): par 'phel ba'i don du sgrogs// mthu rje'i bdag nyid rnams kyi dbyangs gcig kyang // sdug bsngal me rab zhi ba'i don du 'jug/ lhar ni mdzes shing yid 'ong sil snyan skra// sems kyi rgod pa 'phel bar 'gyur ba'i rgyu// thugs rje'i
83b2(mdo 'grel): bdag nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung // ting 'dzin sems gtong bsam pa skul byed nyid// mdor na ma lus 'jig rten rnamasu yang // lha dang sa yi bde ba'i rgyu gang yin// de ni ma lus 'jig rten khyab snang lo// dbyangs
83b3(mdo 'grel): nyid la ni rab tu brten par brjod// ji ltar snang ba dang bal bas// phra mo'i sgra ni mi myo nga zhing // thams cad lta yi rna bar yang // rna lam du ni mi 'gro zhing // de bzhin chos phra mchog tu ni// zhib mo'i ye shes spyod yul
83b4(mdo 'grel): yang // nyon mongs med yid 'ga' zhig gi/ rna lam du ni 'gyur ba yin// ji ltar dbyer gyi dus na sprin// lo tog phun sum tshogs pa'i rgyu// chu yi phung po 'bad med par// se la rgyun du 'bebs pa ltar// de bzhin mthu rje'i
83b5(mdo 'grel): sprin las ni// rgyal ba'i dam chos chu yi cha rwa// 'gro ba'i dge ba'i lo tog rgyu// rnam par rtog pa med par 'bebs// ji ltar 'jig rten dge ba'i lam 'jug na// rlung skyes chu char sprin gyis 'bebs pa ltar// de bzhin brje rlung
83b6(mdo 'grel): 'gro dge mngon 'phel phyir// sangs rgyas sprin las dam chos char 'bebri pa// srid la mkhyen dang brtse chen 'gyur ba dang // mi 'gyur ma gos na mkha'i dkyil gnas pa// ting 'dzin gzungs chu dri med snying po can// thub da
84a1(mdo 'grel): sprin nI dge ba'i kha tog rgyu// ji ltar bsil dang zhim dang 'jam pa dang // yang ba'i chu ni sbyin de las 'thon pa// sa la ba tsha la sogs gnas 'brel bas// shin tu mang ba'i ror ni 'gyur ba bzhin//
84a2(mdo 'grel): de bzhin 'phags pa'i yan lag brgyad chu'i char// rab yangs brtse sbyin snying po las mthon pa// 'gro ba'i rgyud kyi gnas kyi dbye ba las// rnam pa mang po'i ro dang ldan par 'gyur// theg pa mchog la drang ba dang // /
84a3(mdo 'grel): bar ma dang ni snang ba yi// phung po gsum ni mi dag dang // rma bya dang ni yi dgas 'dra// dpyid mthar sprin med pa nA mi dang mkha'i mi rgyu ba'i bya dag drang // dbyar tshe sa la char 'bab pa na yi dgras dag ni sdug pa
84a4(mdo 'grel): ltar// snying rje sprin tshogs dag gis chos chu byung dang ma byung ba las kyang // chos 'dod pa dong chos la snang ba'i 'jig rten gzhan ni dpe de nyid// thigs pa rigs 'bebs rdo chen dang ni rdo rje'i me ni 'bebs pas
84a5(mdo 'grel): na// srog chags phra dang rI sul song ba dag ni ji ltar sprin ltos med// phra dang rgya chen rigs thabs tshul gyis mkhyen pa dang ni brtse ba'i sprin// nyon mongs dag 'gyur bdag lha'i bag la nyal dgra rnam kun ltos
84a6(mdo 'grel): pa med// 'khor ba skye 'chi thog mtha' med der 'gro ba'i lam ni rnam pa lnga// mi gtsang ba la dri zhim med bzhin 'gro lnga dag na bde ba med// de yi sdug bsngal rtag tu me mtshon rgya che la sogs reg skyes bzhin//
84b1(mdo 'grel): mthu rje'i sprin las dam chos chan chen de rab zhi byed rab tu 'bebs// lha la 'chi 'pho mi lnga yongs tshol sdug bsngal zhes byar rtogs pa'i phyir// shes rab ldan pa lha mi'i dbang phyug mchog la'ang mngon par 'dod med/
84b2(mdo 'grel): shes rab dang ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsuM rab dad pa'i rjes 'brangs nas// 'di ni sdug bsngal 'di rgyu 'di ni 'gog ces shes pas mthong phyir ro// nad ni shes bya nad kyi rgyu ni spang bya la// bde gnas thob bya sman ni
84b3(mdo 'grel): bsten par bya ba ltar// sdug bsngal rgyu dang de 'gog pa dang de bzhin lam// shes bya reg par bya zhing brten par bya// ji ltar tshangs pa tshangs pa yi// gnas nas 'phro ba med bzhin du// lha yi gnas ni thams cad du// snang ba 'a/
84b4(mdo 'grel): med ston pa ltar// de bzhin thub pa chos sku las// bskyod pa meng bar khams kun du// skal ldan rnams la 'bad med par// sprul pa dag ni sten par mjed// ji ltar tshangs rtag gzhal yas khang lngas mi g.yo 'dod khams
84b5(mdo 'grel): zhugs pa de// lha rnams kyis mthong de mthong de ni yul la dga' ba sbeng byed ltar// de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi sku lngas mi skyong 'jig rten kun du de// skal ldan gyis mthong de mthong de yang rtag tu dri ma kun sel byed// sngon gyi
84b6(mdo 'grel): rang nyid smon lam dang // lha rnams kyi ni dge ba'i mthus// ji ltar tshangs pa 'bad med snang // rang byung sprul sku de bzhin no// 'pho dang lhums 'jug bltams dang yab kyi khab gshegs dang // dgyes rol dang dben par
85a1(mdo 'grel): spyod dang bdud bcom dang // byang chub che brnyes zhi ba'i grong khyer lam ston dag/ bstan gnas thub pa skal med mig gi lam mi 'gyur// ji ltar nyi ma gdugs pas dus gcig tshe nyid la// bang sogs rgyas
85a2(mdo 'grel): dAdang ku mu da ni rab zum pa// chu skyes bye dang zum pa'i yon tan skyon dag la// nyi ma rtog med 'dir ni 'phags pa'i nyi de bzhin// ji ltar nyi ma rtog med par rang 'od cig car spros pa yis// padu rgyas par byed pa dang // gzhan dag
85a3(mdo 'grel): smin par byed pa ltar// de bzhin de bzhin gshegs pa yi// nyi mo dam chos 'od zer dag/ gdul bya'i skye bo pad+ma la// rnam par rtog pa med par 'jug/ chos dang gzugs kyi sku dag ni// byang chub snying po'i mkhar shar ba// kun mkhyen
85a4(mdo 'grel): nyi ma 'gro bar ni// ye shes 'od zer spro bar mdzad// gang phyir gdul bya dag pa yi// chu yi snod ni thams cad la// bde gshegs nyi ma'i gzugs brnyan ni// dpag tu med pa cig tsor 'char// rtag tu thams cad la khyab po//
85a5(mdo 'grel): chos dbyings na mkha'i dkyil du ni// sangs rgyas nyi ma gdul bya yi// rI la ji ltar 'os par 'babs// ji ltar rgya chen 'od zer stong ldan nyi shar 'di// 'jig rten kun tu snang bar byas nas rim gyis ni// mchog dang ma dmyan
85a6(mdo 'grel): pa'i ri lo 'bab de bzhin// rgyal ba'i nyi mo sems can tshogs la rim gyis 'bab// zhing kun na mkha'i mthil spro nyi ma la med la// mi shes mun bkab shes bya'i don ston pa yang min// mthu rje'i bdag nyid sna tsho
85b1(mdo 'grel): mdog bkye 'od tshogs kyis// gsal bu dag ni 'gro la shes bya'i don ston mdzad// sangs rgyas grong du gshegs tshe mig dang mi ldan pa yi skye bo rnams// mthong zhing dron med tshogs bral don de mthong ba las ni myong
85b2(mdo 'grel): tha dang // gti mug gis ljongs srid pa'i tshor lhung lte ba'i mun pas bsgribs pa rnams// sangs rgyas nyi ma'i 'od kyis blo snang ba ma mthong ba yi gnas mthong 'gyur// ji ltar yid bzhin nor bu ni// rtog pa med kyang cig car du//
85b3(mdo 'grel): spyod yul gnas pa rnams kyi ni// bsam kun so sor rdzogs khyed ltar// de bzhin sangs rgyas yid bzhin la// brten nas bsam pa tha dad rnams// sna tshogs chos ni thos 'gyur yang // de ni de la rnam mi rtog/ ji ltar nor
85b4(mdo 'grel): bu rin chen rtog med 'dod pa'i nor// 'bad pa med par gzhan pa dag la rab ster ltar// de bzhin thub pa 'bang med ji ltar 'os par ni// gzhan gyi don du srid pa ji srid rtag tu bzhugs// gang phyir rgya mtshos 'og gnas
85b5(mdo 'grel): de la 'dod pas// ji ltar nor bu bzang po 'gro 'dir rab rnyed dka'// de bzhin 'gro ba shin du sbrul danA nyon mongs zin// yid 'dir bde gshegs mthong ba rnyed dkar shes par bya// ji ltar s+thA byornyan gyi nI sgra// gzhan gyi
85b6(mdo 'grel): rnam rig las byung ba// rnam rtog med cing bzo med pa// phyi dang nang na mi gnas ltar// de bzhin de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung // gzhan gyi rnam rig las byung ba// rnam par rtog med bzo med cing // phyi dang nang na gan
86a1(mdo 'grel): ma yin// cung zad med cing snang ba med// dmigs pa med cing rten med pa// mig gi lam la rab 'das pa// gzugs med bstan du med pa yi// mkha' la ji ltar mtho dang dma'// mthong yang de ni de lnga
86a2(mdo 'grel): min// de bzhin thams cad sangs rgyas la// mthong yang de ni de lta min// ji ltar sa las skye ba kun// rtog me sa la brten nas ni// 'phel dang brtan dang yangs 'gyur ltar// de bzhin rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sa// rnam rtog me
86a3(mdo 'grel): pa la brten nas// 'gro ba'i dge ba'i rtsi ba ni// ma lus pa ni 'phel bar 'gyur// 'bad rtsol med par bya ba 'ga'// byed pa mthong med de bas na// gdul bya'i the tshom bcad pa'i phyir// dpe rnam dgu ni brtan pa yin// gang du
86a4(mdo 'grel): dpe dgu po 'di dag/ rgyas par rab tu bstan gyur pa// mdo sde yi ni ming nyid kyis// de yis dgos po bstan pa nyid// thos pa lngas byung shes pa yi// snang ba rgya chen 'dis brgyan pa'i// blo ldan myur du sangs rgyas kyi// spyod
86a5(mdo 'grel): yul kun la 'jug pa 'gyur// de don bai DUr brgya byin gyis// gzugs brnyanA la sogs dpe dag ni// rnam pa dgu brjod de la ni// de yi bsdus don nges par bzung // ston dang gsung dang khyab pa dang // sprul pa ye shes spro
86a6(mdo 'grel): dang // thugs gsung sku yi gsang ba dang // thugs rje'i bdag nyid thob pa nyid// 'bad rtsol rgyun kun rab zhi ba// rnam par rtog pa med pa'i thugs// dri med bai DUr brgya byin gyi// gzugs brnyan shar ba la sogs bzhin//
86b1(mdo 'grel): 'bad rtsol zhi ba dam bca' ste// rtog med thugs ni gtan tshig so// rang gzhan don ni grub don du// dpe ni brgya byin gzugs sogs yin// 'dir ni skabs don 'di yin te// ston pa la sogs rnam dgu ni// ston pa skye
86b2(mdo 'grel): 'chi dang bral ba// 'bad pa med par 'jug pa'o// gang zhig brgya byin rnga dang sbyin bzhin dang // tshangs nyid rin chen yid bzhin nor rgyal bzhin sgra brnyan na mkha' sa bzhin srid pa'i bar// 'bad med gzhan don byed de
86b3(mdo 'grel): rnal 'byor rig/ rin chen lha dbang snang bzhin ston pa ste// logs par 'doms mjed lha yi rnga dang 'dra// khyab bdag mkhyen dang brtse chen sprin tshogs ni// mtha' yas 'gro ba srid rtse'i bar du khyab// tshangs bzhin zag
86b4(mdo 'grel): med gnas la ma bskyod par// sprul pa rnam pa du mA rab tu ston+da// nyi bzhin ye shes snang ba rab spro gang // rnam dag rin tshon yid bzhin nor 'dra'i thugs// rgyal ba rnams kyi gsung de brag+h+ra ca bzhin du yi ge med// sku
86b5(mdo 'grel): ni nam mkha' lta bur khyob dang gzugs med rtag pa nyid// sa bzhin 'gro ba'i dkar po'i chos kyi sman rnams ma lus pa'i// rnam pa kun tu bzhin gyur pa ni sangs rgyas sa yino// dag po bai DUr+ya 'dra yaM// sems le
